title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam 520 V9 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and suitable for various activities including running, sports, and all-day wear. They appreciate the fit, particularly for wide feet, and consider them a good value, with one customer noting they don't hurt their feet at all. The shoes receive positive feedback for their lightweight design and arch support, with one customer mentioning they keep feet happy all day. Durability receives mixed reviews, with some finding them durable while others report issues with the toe area.

Review.review: I’ve been wearing the New Balance Fresh Foam sneakers in the Vintage Indigo/NB Navy/Electric Sky color, and they are incredibly comfortable! From the very first step, I could feel the soft and supportive cushioning—my feet feel great even after hours of walking.They’re lightweight, breathable, and offer just the right amount of bounce for daily activities. Whether I’m running errands, going for a walk, or just out and about, these shoes keep my feet happy all day.On top of that, the design is sleek and modern—the color combo is really eye-catching without being too flashy.If you’re looking for everyday sneakers that combine comfort, quality, and style, I totally recommend these!
Perfect gift ! Good and comfortable, great variety and sizes, and just overall good and durable ! Great for walking and everyday use !

Very comfortable shoes, well padded and the tongue is lose on the sides so these shoes work well with swollen feet if you leave them tied loosely.  Good for high arches. Breath well. Very lightweight.  Run true to size.  These shoes are made for mens feet, not for woman or little kids like so many now days.  I would buy again, and will probably pick up a second spare pair.

I ended up really happy with these shoes. I bought them after getting back into running. My last pair was New Balance as well, but these ones really stand out for their arch support and stability. I like the curved sole and how it sort of keeps you propelled forward. They are comfortable for walking, but really supportive during runs thanks to dense foam and good cushioning in the sole. Probably not ideal for veteran runners, but great for someone getting back into it, I strongly recommend these shoes.
Great shoes -look great

Size: 11X Wide  Color: Black/Black/PhantomI have had theses shoes for a month now and they are great for running, walking, and working out.  I like the fact that they are light weight, supports my high arch, and very comfortable.  I wear an 11X Wide and this shoe fits me perfectly without a sock.  The shoe is not as wide as my other shoes of the same size.  Where I live the temperatures are in the 90s or triple digits in the summer months so I'm not too worried about the sock issue.  I can order another color and go up to a 11.5 X Wide.

Been wearing these for two months as interior work shoes with a lot of walking involved. They feel very comfortable and have held up quite well so far. The material used would probably not hold up well for trail hiking or industrial work, the uppers are thin, mesh material that breathes well. I plan to purchase another pair for future replacements when I need them. The V7 model was also excellent.

I’ve been wearing New Balance shoes for years, and this pair did not disappoint. Right out of the box, they were incredibly comfortable—no break-in period needed. The cushioning is perfect for long walks or standing for extended periods, and the support is excellent, especially if you have high arches like I do.The design is sleek and modern, making them easy to pair with both workout clothes and casual outfits. The materials feel high quality, and the construction is solid. I’ve worn them almost daily for the past few weeks, and they still look and feel great.If you’re looking for a reliable, stylish, and comfortable shoe, I highly recommend this one. Great value for the price!

title: New Balance Mens Fresh Foam Arishi V4Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes extremely comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their good fit that conforms well to feet, with one customer noting they're suitable for wide feet. They receive positive feedback for their appearance, value for money, and lightweight design. Regarding size, while some customers find the wider sizes perfect, others report they run half a size too small. Moreover, durability receives mixed reviews, with some saying they last long while others report them falling apart within two weeks.

Review.review: I have been wearing the New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Arishi for a few weeks now, and they’ve quickly become my go-to shoes. The Fresh Foam cushioning is exactly what it promises...super soft and supportive without feeling bulky. Thw quality is great. Whether I’m on my feet all day, taking long walks, or just running errands, these shoes are super comfy for the long haul.They’re also surprisingly lightweight, which makes a big difference if you’re active. The fit is true to size, and the breathable mesh keeps my feet cool. Plus, they look great with just about anything. Highly recommend if you're looking for everyday comfort with solid performance.
I bought the for my father and he loved them. Great for running. The quality is great. Very comfortable. And they fit perfectly

I love these shoes for everyday wear.  I bought the men's because I like the color and the men's shoe often has the added pounding support I like. The color is perfect and so is the fit.  However, I bought these for power walking and I can get about 3 miles in before my feet start aching.  But, again, just all day casual walking, so comfy. They are very light.

Excellent fit and comfort, and nice, neat look.  My aging husband has lots of spine and feet issues that make the fit and support of his shoes extremely important, and these work great in helping him stay on his feet
My husband loves these shoes. There light weight and so comfy.

I'm normally very rough on shoes. These have withstood 4 months with no fraying or broken laces. They're very worth the value in my opinion. I'm very impressed with the durability and functionality of the shoe. I will more than likely be buying these again, if the ones I got now ever do wear out, or I want a different color option.The shoes are definitely meant for runners/athletes. The aerated front portion of the shoes ensures that your foot maintains cover of airflow which substantially cuts down on smells from trapped perspiration. Obviously, ordering a size 15 tells you that I'm a big guy. However, the sole of the shoes has been outstanding. The heel portion does not leave me sore and the ball-of-foot portion does not leave me feeling like I have pins/needles in my foot after a run.I put them through the test of all tests for wearing shoes. They survived 4 days of 17,000+ steps in Walt Disney World parks (Orlando, Florida) during the day. No intention of throwing shade, but I purchased a pair of shoes from Disney Springs at a whopping $150 dollars that didn't make it past 7 months - it was a big brand that has celebrity collaborations!As far as shoes go, and I'm not just saying this because shoes are normally so expensive for me due to my size, these compare with a pair of Asics as far as comfortability and durability. They don't quite meet Merrill quality, but if they tweaked the materials they use for the sole without sacrificing price going with a Vibram sole, they could be very close.

They look like they'd be comfortable,  but they just look good. Also, everyone seems to use these paper thin insoles nowadays; you almost need to add $20 to any new shoe purchase, to account for buying after market insoles.
These shoes are a great deal for New Balance.  Loved them.

title: New Balance Men's 410 V8 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes to be of good quality, comfortable, and well-fitting, with one customer noting they're roomy enough for arch support orthotics. The style receives positive feedback, and customers consider them good value for money. The durability and sizing receive mixed reviews - while the shoes hold up well on different surfaces, some customers report eyelets tearing out, and while some find them perfectly sized, others mention they run small. The width aspect also gets mixed feedback, with some praising the nice wide toe box while others find them very narrow.

Review.review: Fit true to size. Awesome quality, provide great support and look nice! My husband isn't a sporty guy, but not a grungy guy, these are the perfect shoe for the "everyday guy". They look really nice, he has gotten lots of compliments. Great arch support and comfortable.
You can't go wrong with New Balance. These are durable, comfortable, lightweight, and they look great. These work in all conditions and are a high quality shoe.

I love these sneakers!Legendary New Balance quality and materials and construction and long term durability!Always a perfect fit!!!5 stars!!!THOUGH, I must say this.. Most color variations on this sneaker are between $50-$65, which is a pretty fair deal..The particular color I wanted on Amazon was almost $120..Crazy, right?I'm not taking away any stars, because these sneakers are simply awesome in quality and fit..But, to buyers... PAY ATTENTION to the price as you check out the different colors!!!!It might change a lot depending on what you click on!!!! LOL

Large choice of sizes, nice style; my son wears an 7 1/2 EEEE (extra wide) which is a hard to find size.  He has worn New Balance for years; they usually are true to size, comfortable & wear well; Good for walking, everyday use.  We are usually very satisfied, but this particular pair seem like they were miss matched because one shoe fits perfectly & the other feels tight; both are marked the same size.

Great value when compared to other trail runners. Lightweight and supportive. These provide exceptional grip during gravel runs and offer comfort to those with wider feet. I'd say go up a 1/2 size as it seems to be a little snug on the length, but I use these for pretty intense elevation so that could just be me.

The comfort level of these shoes exceeded my expectations. I have done long-distance running and also gone on hiking trips wearing them. This is a very sturdy pair of shoes. They are very comfortable for long walks and walking on rough terrains!

Overall, a decent shoe, but they don't seem to be great overall. The stitching in areas around the insole seems a bit weak and doesn't offer a ton of support. I wouldn't recommend for daily wearing, which is what I needed when I purchased these shoes, they're just not comfortable for me, but I will say, I'm a bigger guy, so that may be some of the reason. I will say though, I've had Nike shoes for years and daily wore them with absolutely no issues. I was actually replacing a pair of New Balance shoes with this pair, and after receiving this pair, I noticed immediately several differences, including the previously mentioned stitching, the weight was different, which I attributed to the different shoe model, but the logo was also different and looked as though it was screenprinted on and not a stitched on logo, which looked and felt cheap, almost like a counterfeit. I will say, the shoes have good grip, but I definitely feel it after wearing them all day. My feet stay tired most of the day while wearing these, but can't afford to replace them after only wearing for a few months. The problems with tired feet started day 1, so it's not a recent issue. They look good though and like I said, have good grip. I probably wouldn't buy them again, but I'm a unique situation, wearing them daily, all day, they might be better for working out or running, but for walking I wouldn't recommend. Very little support when it comes to foot sole support. I should say I purchased these on sale and I was able to receive them in 2 days, which was the main reason for my purchase.
Great fitting shoes & so comfortable & last!

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam 680 V8 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, with one noting they're very forgiving on joints, and appreciate their excellent cushioning with plenty of foam. The shoes receive positive feedback for their quality, fit, and arch support, and customers consider them good value for money. Regarding size and durability, opinions are mixed - while some find the width perfect for their needs, others report the shoes run narrow, and while some say they hold up well over time, others mention they don't last.

Review.review: I’ve been wearing the New Balance Fresh Foam 680v8 for a few weeks now, and I’m seriously impressed. Straight out of the box, they felt incredibly comfortable the Fresh Foam midsole provides soft cushioning without feeling too squishy.The fit is true to size, and the upper mesh is breathable yet supportive, making it great for both walks and light workouts. What really stands out is how stable and balanced my feet feel, even after hours of wear.Whether you’re standing all day, going for a run, or just need a dependable sneaker for daily use, this one hits the mark. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a durable and cushioned shoe without breaking the bank!

I ourchased a pair of these, locally, this Spring for my 12 year old son. By mid summer he had begun to grow out of them! I couldn’t find a size 10 anywhere! Finally one came on here and I was able to secure it. You can take them to local DSW to have them water and dirt proofed. They are lightweight yet great quality and very comfortable. The material is soft cloth and the soles are thick and sturdy. Only thing I would say is deeper tread is needed for all shoe soles to ensure better grip. These do not come with waterproof protection so take them in. It’s cheap to have done. He loves them and I will probably buy this pair again for future when he outgrows this one. He loves the color combo and they have great support for feet and legs.

I recently picked up the New Balance Men's Fresh Foam 680 V8 Running Shoe in the Angora/Arid Stone colorway, and it's been a fantastic addition to my footwear collection. The Fresh Foam midsole provides a plush, cushioned ride that's perfect for both my daily runs and casual walks. The engineered mesh upper ensures breathability, keeping my feet cool during workouts. I appreciate the neutral color palette, which makes the shoes versatile enough to pair with various outfits. While the shoe offers excellent comfort and support, I did notice that it runs slightly small, so I recommend considering a half-size up for the best fit. Overall, the 680 V8 delivers on comfort, style, and performance, making it a reliable choice for everyday wear.

Very comfortable. New balance shoes are predictably good shoes. They aren’t what they used to be, in general. But these are well-made. I feel they run a little bit small, given that my last pair of shoes was new balance in the same size, comparing the two.The one issue is a design flaw in the toe, where an internal support causes the fabric on the top of the forefoot to wear quickly. But someone would have to look closely to see this. It hasn’t affected the shoe’s stability yet, and I am guessing the tread will wear out before the fabric does.

Husband loves them.. He walks every other day for 1 hour. The fit is great, comfortable with stability. Good quality shoe, definitely great value for the money. My husband buys  a new pair once a year.
Comfortable shoes, good quality, true to size and excellent for walking, very light weight with good arch support. I bought a second pair in a different color.
Best shoe I've ever had. Comfortable for a 10 hour warehouse shift, wide in the toe area so it's not tight. The inside has start falling apart after 9 months of everyday use. Great shoe.

Another reviewer mentioned the asymmetrical design in front of the laces which put him off and it's a little weird but I can get over it due to the fact that they are so comfortable to wear. They have a ton of cushion and look like they're made of top notch materials. These are replacing an old pair of Nike Air Max which I've had a long time but recently running they have been hurting my feet and shins so I thought it was time for something softer. I'm a month shy of 51 and by no means a pro runner, I've been running for 7 months and I do 1.2, 2.4 or 3.6 miles at a time usually a few times a week. That said, on the first 1.2 mile run I put them through, they felt much better than my old Nike's and I obliterated my personal best for 1 mile and total time (1.2 miles total). I am very happy with the price I got them for $55 Prime, but would say they are definitely worth the regular price of $79 as well. Have seen a few different colors go on sale from time to time on both Amazon and the NewBalance website for what I paid.

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam X 1080 V14 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, high quality, and appreciate their soft cushioning, with one customer noting they hug the feet like pillows. They are excellent for walking and running, making full-day wear easier. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some find them snug without being tight, others say they're too narrow in the toe box. Stability and durability also get mixed reviews, with some finding them stable and worth the price, while others report them falling apart quickly and not being worth the cost.

Review.review: This is my second pair of 1080s, and the V14 just took things to another level. I wear these for everything — running, long walks, even just daily errands — and they’ve honestly become my favorite all-around shoe.The Fresh Foam X cushioning is the real deal. It feels soft but still gives me enough bounce, especially when I’m putting in a few miles on pavement. There’s no weird break-in period — they felt great right out of the box.What I noticed most with this version is the improved upper — it wraps around your foot more snugly without feeling tight. It breathes well too, which I appreciate here in Florida. My feet don’t feel overheated even on long runs.I have slightly wide feet and went with the standard width, and they still felt roomy enough in the toe box. Sizing was true for me. The traction is solid too — I haven’t had any slipping, even on damp sidewalks.If you're looking for a shoe that can handle real mileage but still feel great just walking around town, this is it. Yeah, they’re not cheap — but for what they do, they’re totally worth the price.

The New Balance Fresh Foam 1080 v14 is one of the most comfortable running shoes I’ve tried. The Fresh Foam cushioning feels soft underfoot while still giving plenty of support, making it great for long runs, workouts, or even just being on your feet all day. The upper is lightweight and breathable, and the fit hugs the foot without feeling too tight.Traction is solid, and the shoe feels stable on different surfaces. Whether you’re running or just looking for an everyday sneaker with serious comfort, the 1080 v14 delivers.

I have worn several different New Balance models. All in 9.5 4E. As other reviewers have noted this shoe is a bit more snug however that works perfectly for me. Others have suggested buying 1/2 size larger. I’m so glad that I did not. I would call this correctly sized. The shoe is very comfortable, very spongy to walk on. Expensive, yes but after wearing them for a week on my daily 5 mile walk I’m very pleased with this purchase. Far superior to the NB 940 they replaced.

The New Balance 1080v14 delivers outstanding comfort and soft cushioning that's perfect for daily wear and long walks. I usually get a size 11, but if a 10.5 Wide is available, I would opt for it for a slightly better fit. Overall, a solid, high-quality shoe that I’m glad I picked up on Amazon!

They lack stability and if you're a heavier person the sole will squish all the way down and the shoes can be wobbly sometimes but they are sooo comfortable, if you have neutral pronation and aren't too heavy I recommend them. I sadly returned them due to the squishyness but I will be honest and say I miss how soft they felt.
High quality, the right size as expected, very comfortable, very light.  I use it for running on off-road and on asphalt.

Slipped on the Fresh Foam X 1080s and I swear I heard my feet whisper, “Thank you.” These shoes are ridiculously comfy — like someone convinced a cloud to get a PhD in foot support.Whether I’m jogging, walking, or just doing laps around the kitchen pretending I’m productive, these babies deliver bounce, cushion, and style. They’re so light, I double-checked to make sure I didn’t accidentally leave the soles in the box.My knees are no longer filing complaints, my feet are basically in therapy recovery mode, and I now judge every other shoe like, “Do you Fresh Foam though?”If you’re on the fence — hop off. These shoes will catch you. Softly.

These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever wore in my life. I used to run a lot in the Army. I've always wore New Balance due to their comfort. It's been over Ten years since I've been in the army so I haven't had a reason to wear New Balance. I decided to get back in shape and start running again so I purchased these 1080 fresh foam X New Balance shoes. OH MY GOD! New Balance has completely changed the game. These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. It feels like your running on comfort and they are very light weight too. These are game changers. I highly recommend these shoes for running or walking.

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam X 1080 V14 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their cushioning, with one describing them as feeling like walking on pillows. The shoes offer good support, particularly for flat feet, and are suitable for wide feet, with one customer noting they accommodate arthritic toes. While some customers report their feet don't hurt anymore, others experienced blisters during 10k runs, and opinions on value for money are divided between those who find them worth the price tag and those who consider them disappointing.

Review.review: 60 yr old female with usually 8.5EE wide shoes. For the NB1080 I ordered the 8.5 xwide - not the double x. FIT PERFECTLY! Slightly rounded heel, rocker heel, caused me to step backwards at first to find my balance. Now I get it - this heel design creates a super fluid gait - remarkably smooth and gentle walking experience. The arch support is very good and feels perfect for easing my plantar fascitis. The cushioning is excellent - not squishy like crocs at all, just soft and comfy like no other shoe I've had.  Took a couple days for my hips and knees to adjust to being aligned properly but now I'm fully in love. Im able to walk longer and further than ever with no soreness anywhere just joy! Worth every penny.

I purchased these on July 21, 2025, and I’m beyond happy with them! The Fresh Foam cushioning is unbelievably soft and supportive, perfect for long walks, runs, or all-day wear. They feel like walking on clouds. The color (Earth Shadow/Reflection/Urgent Red) is beautiful and unique, very stylish yet subtle. I’ve gotten compliments already!They fit true to size, and the quality is excellent as expected from New Balance. My feet feel secure and comfortable with no break-in period needed. I highly recommend these if you’re looking for comfort, support, and a modern look all in one.

They exceeded all my expectations! First of all, they arrived even earlier than the estimated delivery date, always a great surprise. As soon as I put them on, I could tell they were made for me. The fit is absolutely perfect, true to size, and no break-in period needed. But the real magic? The comfort. It honestly feels like I’m walking on clouds, so light, cushioned, and supportive.

These are absolutely the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned! The amount of cushion and support feels like you are literally walking on a cloud. I also really like the color and they fit very comfortably, not too tight anywhere. I average about 15,000 to 20,000 steps a day and these never get flat, my back never hurts and neither do my feet. I ordered a second pair.

I was hesitant to buy this at first, but I am so happy that I made the purchase. Best investment for my aching feet  This shoes are so great for my feet! They’re so comfortable. Especially I work 12 hrs in the hospital and I’m on feet all day. This shoes helps me a lot and my feet aren’t even that sore. I’m looking to get another pair for a different color. It has a great support. I love it overall  and it is light weight too.  Super great quality and very comfortable. It feels like I’m walking on a gel😂

Perfect!! These shoes plus my custom orthotics perfectly support my over pronated flat feet and allowed me to regain functional activity after being mostly wheelchair dependent for a couple of years! Along with specific PT exercises and stretching, I now have relief from my chronic foot, knee, hip, and low back pain. Plus they are still lightweight and breathable, so perfectly comfortable through the heat of summer too. If I am awake, these shoes are on my feet!
Great shoe. Comfortable. But wide in toe box for a AA width
The best shoes hands down! These are my all time favorite shoe. They are so comfortable and are true to size. They provide really great support and helped with achy feet.

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam X 880 V14 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, with one noting no toe pain, and appreciate their quality, fit, and support, particularly the great arch support. The cushioning receives mixed feedback - while some find it well-cushioned, others say it's too soft. Customers have mixed opinions about the width, with some finding them true to size while others say they're too narrow. Durability is also mixed, with some saying they should last a while while others report the bottoms falling apart.

Review.review: These shoes exceeded my expectations. They’re extremely comfortable right out of the box and feel both sturdy and lightweight. The material quality is excellent and the design looks even better in person. Perfect for walking, going out, or everyday use. Definitely one of my best recent purchases.

The New Balance 880 is a reliable, all-around daily trainer used for everything from easy runs to long runs, mild trails, and speed work. It offers a snug fit, strong durability, solid grip, and balanced cushioning, making it a dependable, no-frills workhorse shoe for high mileage. Support is good but it’s a flatter shoe so if you like a bouncy feel, go for the 1080. Fits as expected.

I’ve tried about nine pairs of shoes in the past month—from Brooks to Reebok—and these are the only ones I kept. I have arthritic toes and chronic foot pain, and these honestly changed my life. The wide toe box makes them so comfortable for my toes—no pinching or pressure at all. For the first time in a long time, I can wear actual tennis shoes instead of living in slippers. The cushioning and support are exactly what I needed. If you’ve struggled to find shoes that don’t hurt, these are absolutely worth trying.

Purchased for my husband. I’ve been wearing new balance shoes for a couple years now. We own a comic club and card store and spend 9-12 hours on a concrete floor. These shoes are great quality, solidly made. The style isn’t so great but better than orthopedic shoes ;). They offer great support during those long days that would normally leave you with pain from the toes up. They fit really well with a wider toe box than was expected but not big enough that it’s too much. Do have some issues when walking on wet floors, they can be a little slippery.
Great shoes. Good support and comfort.

Having the right width makes a huge difference.  New Balance and Brooks are about the only running/ walking shoes that come in widths.  I have a narrow, high arch foot and normal width shoes are never right.  These make exercise much more comfortable.  Well made and should last a good while.
Great shoe. Fits well. Light. Good support

I have very high arches and use custom made orthotics which work perfectly with these NB 880’s.  The shoes have a very soft midsole making them super comfortable. I don’t run anymore but do walk about 3 miles per day on average.  The soft midsoles may break down a bit more quickly than firmer shoes but that’s a more than reasonable trade off for me (I’ve been replacing the shoes about twice per year).  Sadly I think NB has new version of this shoe that apparently lacks the super soft midsole so I may have to search for something else to replace them with in the future. The way things go I guess.

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Arishi V4 Tira Lux Running Shoe, Black/Black Cement/Black Cement, 15 Wide
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, stylish, and lightweight, with good value for money. They fit well and are suitable for both walking and exercising, with one customer noting they're perfect for long-distance walking. Regarding size, while some customers say they run true to size, others mention they run slightly small.

Review.review: Love these shoes!  Super fast shipping, I got them next day.  Great price and quality is what i expect.  Will buy again!
Pretty comfortable and true to size. Good price.  Pretty soft to walk on

I have had the same Hoka shoes for literally the past 3 years. I refused to invest in new shoes. My Hokas have held up through the gym, runs on trails, and walks through Walmart.Eventually, I needed some new shoes. So, I went with these New Balance's. I was mostly needing some solid and comfortable running shoes for the gym/ trails and the occasional out and about errands.I LOVE THESE SHOES. These shoes are like a whiff of fresh air. Obviously, switching from a 3 year old pair to a brand new pair makes a huge difference...but regardless, these New Balances are super comfortable, super reliable, super thick, and give me looks from the pretty ladies when I walk by in the gym.Great fit. Proper size. Great style. Would recommend.
Comfortable and look clean. Perfect blend between dad shoe and modern clean look
very comfortablr
Great shoes. fashionable, light, and versatile. Fit really well, I bought a 9.5 mens. Seemed to wear quicker than I expected, but great for the price.
Very good for the price.  Holding up well for a 14 yo who is tough on shoes.

Not sure what to say. The 13W was neither a 13 nor wide. I have had New Balance in the past and it seems the workmanship has declined. There are better quality shoes at Walmart. Very disappointed in New Balance. Better off buying a shoe made in the USA, UK, or Canada.

title: New Balance Men's FuelCell Rebel V5 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, lightweight, and well-cushioned, with one customer noting they don't hurt after a 7-mile hike. They appreciate the style and stability, with one mentioning excellent arch support. The durability receives mixed feedback, with some finding them durable while others report wear after 75-100 miles. The fit also gets mixed reviews.

Review.review: Love this shoe for easier runs. They’re lightweight enough for faster runs. Very comfortable.  My foot size is 9.5 to 10 and I ‘m glad I went with size 10 with these. Some reviews are saying they’re roomy but they seem normal to me. People’s feet are all different, so don’t base your size selection just on what I say. The popular running shoe reviewers on You Tube are a fairly reliable source.
Great shoes for all kinds of training, fast, comfortable, cushioned and reactive

I run a lot and run in a lot of shoes. I’ve worked in the industry and have fitted plenty of people for running shoes.These are a big win for NB. The shoe is everything I enjoy in a running shoe. It’s simple, fun, cushioned, responsive, durable enough, and looks great. It’s also fantastic value for money.The fit is true to size, unlike the previous model. There is no extra upper material to bunch up, but enough width to satisfy someone who complains about shoes being to narrow.The rubber outsole is somewhat minimal and it started to wear after 75-100 miles. That being said, grip is good and outsole wear is not the end of the world. The shoe still has a lot of life in it at 150ish miles. This is going to be one of those that gets turned into a dog walker after I’m finished running in it. In my world, that is a great achievement for a running shoe and is reserved for the most comfortable.
Most comfortable and nice-looking shoes I have purchased.
This is a stability walker/ running shoe. Flat feet. Very light. Breathable.
Excelentes

I feel like Sonic the Hedgehog off a lb of Betty White and 2 gallons of Red Bull. I’m expecting to break the sound barrier in a few weeks with these on. Absolutely love them and they look good. Pretty comfortable if you ask me which I mean they are asking me.
The V5 is not as good as the previous version. The fit was more narrow and didn’t feel as responsive as the V4

title: New Balance Women's 608 V5 Casual Comfort Cross Trainer
Customer_say: Customers find these shoes comfortable, well-fitting with perfect width, and appreciate their great arch support, with one customer noting they're suitable for artificial knees. They receive positive feedback for their appearance, quality, and value for money. Regarding durability, while some say they hold up even after washing multiple times, others report them falling apart within a year. The sizing receives mixed reviews, with some finding them appropriately sized while others say they run small.

Review.review: Super comfortable and supportiveThe New Balance 608 are incredibly comfortable right out of the box. They provide great support for walking and standing all day. The cushioning is soft but still feels stable, and the fit is true to size. Perfect everyday sneakers!

Excellent product. While on vacation my old New Balance sneakers needed to be replaced after many years of jogging and walking. I purchased the exact same type and size, & it got delivered within 7 hrs. The fit, size, style and comfort were perfect. Great and consistent product.

Comfortable, good quality, good arch support and latex-free. True to size. These fit so well that I ordered a backup pair. Verified with New Balance (U.S.) that WX608V5 (X = woman's shoe, X = cross trainer, 608 = model, V5 = version) is latex-free.

I bought the black nonslip shoes for my waitressing job. They are comfortable, look nice, and easy to clean. The toe box however seems a tiny bit too narrow for me. I dont have a terribly wide foot but my pinky toe still gets crammed and aches by the end of the night. It not too too bad especially for the price and I will probably keep these until I have to replace but its worth noting for wider feet.
Perfect gym shoe. Good grip on floors and perfect for machines. Leather looks great for rainy/winter wear.
These shoes fit great and are very comfortable. I barely had to break them in and my arches have wonderful support.  They didn't break the bank and arrived fast and in perfect condition.

I wear these daily. I do a lot of walking and they stay comfortable throughout the day, day after day. Not the most fashionable shoe but they seem like good quality and good value for what you are getting. I would recommend them.

I purchased the size 7.5 Wide in black, the best New Balance sneaker ever.  I don’t have a wide foot, but looking to wear a thicker sock in the late Fall. I love the fit, true to size! Comfort and able to insert my orthotics without any issues.  I am planning on buying another pair, waiting for the color white to go on sale first!

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam X Kaiha Road V1 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-cushioned, and appreciate their arch support. The style receives positive feedback, with customers loving the look. While some customers say the shoes fit true to size, others find them too narrow, and durability is a concern as customers report the shoes tearing apart. The quality and value for money receive mixed reviews, with some customers loving them while others find them terrible and overpriced.

Review.review: I’ve had two pairs of the Kaia model and just ordered two more. I’m a moderate treadmill runner. (5-6 days a week ranging from 3-4.5 miles a day). I love the fit and support of the Kaias and how they keep my feet and legs healthy. It took me a year to recover from shin splints after wearing the wrong shoes for too long (oops). The Kaias last for about 300 miles as the treadmill eats up the soles pretty badly, but I’ll take to soft, flexible feel of the sole over a firm and unforgiving shoe any day. The sole is the only thing that ever shows wear and tear. Highly recommend if you’re a like-minded runner.

So far, so good! Purchased these to support fitness walking of long-ish distances and manage mild to moderate knee pain. They appear to be helping so far, time will tell if they continue to deliver.So many shoes have gone to the Hoka-inspired massive, mushy sole and for me, those are not at all comfortable. I don’t like how my foot strikes the ground and I don’t feel the energy return from each step is optimal. THESE shoes, on the other hand, seem to offer a somewhat restrained fuller sole that gives some cushioning but still feels as though the physics of energy return are supporting your desire to walk with some speed/sense of urgency. Not sloppy at all. And it seems your feet hit the ground in a more natural, comfortable way.These look nice, too. I got the dark grey/black upper with while sole. Pretty understated vs screaming with color which is what I personally prefer.
Very comfortable, fairly priced. I love how light weight they are and easy to clean and they are true to size. I'm a size 9 and the fit is perfect.
These shoes fit great and were comfortable right out of the box. I love the color. I hope they last. The soles are thicker and cushion very well.

I’ve been wearing these New Balance Fresh Foam sneakers for a few weeks now, and I’m seriously impressed. I originally bought them for light workouts and walking, but they’ve quickly become my everyday shoes because of how comfortable and supportive they are.The cushioning is fantastic—soft without feeling squishy—and offers a nice bounce during workouts like walking, cardio, and strength training. What really stood out for me, though, is the arch support. I have slightly flat feet and often deal with foot fatigue, but these shoes give enough support to keep me comfortable, even during longer workouts or when I’m on my feet all day.They’re also really lightweight and breathable, which is great for the gym or just running errands. I’ve had no issues with rubbing or blisters, and I didn’t need to break them in at all. I went with my usual size and the fit was spot-on, with a bit of extra room in the toe box.If you’re looking for a versatile sneaker that works for both fitness and everyday wear—and especially if you need decent arch support—I highly recommend these. New Balance really nailed it with this one.

As someone with a number of foot and ankle issues, finding the right sneaker has always been a challenge. However, the New Balance Women's Fresh Foam X Kaiha Road V1 has been a game-changer for me – so much so that this is my third pair! Quite simply, these are the best sneakers I have ever worn and they last longer than more expensive shoes.The comfort level is exceptional. The Fresh Foam X cushioning provides a fantastic balance of softness and support, which is crucial for my sensitive feet. spending long days on my feet coaching high school football and lacrosse , these shoes consistently deliver all-day comfort without any of the aches and pains I've experienced with other brands. For me, they've been a true lifesaver, and I'll likely be reaching for a fourth pair when the time comes!

On December 28, 2024 I purchased this sneaker in  Black/Phantom/Taro this style held up great.  After 6 months of wear the sneaker started to wear on the bottom and loose its bounce so I decided to purchase another pair on May 4th in Black/Phantom/Silver Metallic.  This sneaker has not held up like it should. The entire bottom of the sneaker has worn out in only 2 months of walking wear.   I don't know if the quality of the Black/Phantom/Silver Metallic is different from the Black/Phantom/Taro, but I would think I should get the same 6 months wear from the same style of sneaker if it is even a different color.  I did just purchase another pair in the original color, I hope this holds up as well because the comfort I get from this sneaker is amazing and I can walk for hours pain free.

These shoes were a great surprise and I love them.  I have difficult, painful feet and I change my shoes out 3 or 4 times a day.  My grand daughter recommended these and I only bought them to not disappoint her.  I'm so glad I did!  They're comfortable enough for me to wear with 5 hours on my feet.  I thought the toe would be too narrow but the meshy fabric has enough "give" that my toes (bunions) aren't cramped.  I highly recommend these shoes.

title: New Balance Women's DynaSoft Nergize Sport V2 Cross Trainer
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their colors and style. They are lightweight and provide good arch support, though opinions about support are mixed. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some find them true to size, others say they run small and are narrow in the toe box. Moreover, durability is a concern as customers report the shoes coming apart and tearing after just two weeks of use.

Review.review: I recently purchased these New Balance women’s shoes, and I’m so impressed with the comfort and quality. They provide excellent support for my feet, which is a huge plus since I’m on my feet a lot during the day. The cushioning feels soft yet responsive, making them great for walking, running errands, or even light workouts.The design is stylish and versatile — they go well with casual outfits and even sporty looks. The fit is true to size, and the breathable material keeps my feet cool, which I really appreciate during warmer days.I’ve noticed no discomfort even after wearing them for hours, and the shoes seem durable so far. Overall, these New Balance shoes offer the perfect balance of comfort, support, and style. Highly recommend for anyone looking for reliable everyday sneakers!

As a busy mom who’s constantly on the go and squeezes in gym time when I can, these shoes have been a total game-changer! I needed something comfortable enough for chasing after kids but supportive enough for workouts and these totally deliver.They’re super lightweight, easy to slip on when I’ve got my hands full, and the cushioning is amazing. I can go from school drop-offs to strength training without skipping a beat. No foot pain, no break-in time just all-day comfort.Plus, the clean white look is cute and stylish, which is a bonus when you’re rocking leggings and a hoodie 90% of the time. If you’re a mom trying to balance life and fitness, get these shoes. You won’t regret it!I also recommend washing them on a hand washing or delicate cycle AIR DRY ONLY! If you need an easy stain remover I suggest also spraying them with dawn power wash before throwing them in the washer.

Very light weight & comfortable. Definitely size up, I ordered my usual size 10 & read that a lot of people return due to them running small so I went with 10 wides just in case. When I received, they were still extremely tight - I returned & ordered a 10.5 wide & they fit perfectly.
Comfortable and cute shoes.
Wonderful, great support, very comfortable

These are cute and comfortable for shorter periods of time. They fit great but not as comfortable as I had hoped after having spine surgery and going back to work cleaning a very large Dr office. The bottoms of my feet and lower back hurt after about 5-6 hours of walking around

Comfort: The New Balance Women’s Dynasoft Nergize Sport V2 Cross Trainer is incredibly comfortable right out of the box. The Dynasoft cushioning feels plush underfoot, making it perfect for all-day wear. Whether you’re hitting the gym or running errands, these shoes provide great support without sacrificing comfort.Fit: These cross trainers fit true to size, but they have a slightly snug fit, which is great for those who prefer a more locked-in feel. However, if you have wider feet, you might want to consider going up half a size. The slip-on design with a lace-up front gives it a sleek look while ensuring a secure fit.Design: The all-black design is sleek and versatile, making it easy to pair with any workout gear or casual outfit. The minimalist aesthetic is modern, and the subtle branding keeps the look clean and stylish.Performance: The Dynasoft Nergize V2 is excellent for a variety of activities, from light workouts to everyday wear. The traction is good on most surfaces, and the shoes offer a nice balance of flexibility and stability. However, for more intense workouts or running, you might need something with more specialized support.Durability: After a few weeks of use, the shoes show minimal signs of wear. The materials used seem durable and should hold up well over time, though the lightweight nature might not offer the same longevity as more robust trainers.Conclusion: Overall, the New Balance Women’s Dynasoft Nergize Sport V2 Cross Trainer is a solid choice for anyone looking for a comfortable, stylish, and versatile shoe. It’s perfect for low-impact workouts, walking, or just everyday wear. While it may not be the best option for high-intensity training, it excels in everyday comfort and style.
The shoes are beautiful and comfortable but they fit small, short in the length of the foot.  I returning the ones I bought half size larger and purchasing the next size.

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam Roav V1 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these shoes comfortable and appreciate their great look, quality, and color combination. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it's great, others find them too tight for fat feet. The cushioning and arch support also get mixed reviews, with some praising the good cushioning while others note insufficient arch support. Durability is a concern, with one customer reporting issues with the toe area wearing through.

Review.review: Great fit and very comfortable
These new ballet shoes are fire. Love love love the design and the clean look. Extremely comfortable. Highly recommend.
Nice sneaksRun a little big but I like them
Exceeded my expectations!...  thoroughly impressed with the quality!!. The color combination is on point!!!
They nice but not to walk long distances. Sole isnt cushioned enough
The sizing and sole is different than the black & white pair that I bought at Famous Footwear.  Pretty strange.

They arrived in a shoe box that was collapsing. The shoes were in perfect condition. They appeared a little longer than my other new balance roavs. Color was what I expected. These are golf shoes but I didn’t read the description close enough. I did not need golf shoes and will return. I did not try them on.
Best running shoes so confortable, love them.

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam X Evoz V4 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable and of high quality, with one mentioning they work well for light runs. They appreciate the great fit and consider them good value for money. Customers also like the style, particularly noting the appealing colorway.

Review.review: This is a very attractive shoe that goes well with Jeans and is very comfortable on the treadmill at my Youfit. I have purchased the last two versions of the EVOX and they get better every time. This upper appears better crafted and more stylish than the past two.  You will not be dissatisfied.
Great shoe and great price. Nice style. Very comfortable
High quality shoe.  Very comfortable.
Good
great comfort. great fit. fair price.
My husband loves New balance shoes. Good Quality

Really comfortable and good looking running shoe.  Really feel good on my feet with lots of cushioning.  I normally take size 11 wide in running shoes, but bought this one in 11.5 wide wide and they really fit well.
Lleno de pelos. Asqueroso. Defectuoso. Pegante visible. Perforaciones . Muy mala compra.

title: New Balance Kids' Rave Run V2 Lace-Up Running Shoes
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers fit well, particularly for wide feet, and appreciate their quality, comfort, and appearance. They like the color variety and consider them good value for money. The durability receives mixed feedback - while some say they hold up well, others report them falling apart after two weeks of wear. The lace tieability is also mixed, with some customers saying they stay tied while others mention the laces coming untied frequently.

Review.review: Great Kids’ Running ShoesThese shoes are very comfortable and lightweight. The design is stylish, and my kid loves the colors. They fit true to size, provide good support, and seem durable for daily use. Perfect for school and sports!

True to sizeComfortableLook greatLaces are difficult to tie for small fingersI've bought at least 10 pair of these for my son since this is the only nice brand of wide running shoes that look like typical tennis shoes for kiddos. My son is a wide but just a smidge away from double wide so I purchase the double wide when possible for extra comfort. He picked red this time but we've had different shades of blue and black. The colors and designs are always vivid. The laces don't stay tied well, even with double knots, and are tricky for new tie-ers to tie. I replace the laces with elastic, no tie laces. I usually buy black or white laces but took a chance on red and they matched perfectly! They're also purchased on Amazon, the brand is anon520.
Love these sneakers. We buy them every year for school. Only ones my daughter will wear. Has good room in the tow for wider feet. Hold up well and wash up easily.
This is my second time buying these due to my son growing out of the first pair. The first pair still looked great! This new pair are what we were expecting and very comfy!

Stylish and Long Lasting! I always order these type of shoes for my son and they wear really well. I like the black and white as they look a little more stylish. They are lightweight and true to size.

I bought my son the same shoe in a lace-up style, but since he doesn’t know how to tie his shoes yet, I had to return them. They looked nice and fit well, but for kids who can’t tie laces, I’d recommend going with slip-ons or Velcro instead. That’s why I ended up getting the no-lace version I mentioned in my other review, which works perfectly for him.
My son loves them. Good quality & comfortable. This is perfect for an active kid
Perfectly fit for my daughter. Light and cmfortable.

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Arishi V4 Slip-Resistant Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, with one mentioning they reduce foot and knee pain, and appreciate their slip resistance and value for money. The shoes receive positive feedback for their workability, with one customer noting they're great for food service jobs. Customers disagree on the build quality, size, and support, and report durability issues with the shoes wearing down quickly.

Review.review: These shoes are exactly what I wanted. They’re very comfortable. They do run a little small. I read the reviews and ordered a 11.5 when I wear an 11 in every other pair of New Balance I’ve owned. They fit very well by going up a half size.I have multiple problems with my feet and I need high quality shoes and I generally have bought  New Balance for over 20 years. Without any breaking in, these shoes are comfortable and I felt less pain in my feet and knees. I like that they’re no slip. I like the traction because I work on slippery polished floors that are frequently wet.I’ve been wanting a pair of black shoes for quite a while and I’m so happy I found these. I definitely recommend them - BUT - order a little larger than your normal size.
Great kitchen shoes.  Very comfortable.  Seem to be well made.  Sizing is correct. Not overly bulky.  Slip resistant.  Will buy again.
Comfortable work shoe.i use them often at the gym I work at.
Not bad, nice fit. If you work on your feet, I suggest finding better as the comfort it limited. I do like the look of these.
Good prices and comfortable. Recommend people buy that for work.

Apparently the corporate agenda has taken over New Balance footwear. These shoes are made of cheap material all over, like every piece of them.Let me explain, the top of the toe is flimsy and offers no support. It’s like wearing a plastic bag on your foot. I’ve actually worn plastic bags on my feet when I was a kid playing in the snow. We used to wear them under our winter boots so our toes didn’t get soaked after the whole day of winter fun. These shoes feel pretty much the same as just the bag. No support at all, anywhere.If you haven’t worn bags on your feet like me, maybe you’ve tried on a pair of water shoes. They’re about as supportive as water shoes. The  toe box doesn’t exist. Side to side support doesn’t exist. And the heel box is almost nonexistent. I mean it’s there, (heel box), but for a company like New Balance to be selling shoes this cheaply made is not what I’m used to from this brand. This company used to sell shoes that gave you.. well, good balance. Their shoes passed the twist test, were made of leather, and had support every where you wanted it, and even where you didn’t know you needed it.The tongue is tiny, and bunches up between the lace holes exposing your sock from the top of the shoe. Not good.Laces came untied multiple times the two times I wore these.Nonslip capability…well, they are somewhat nonslip. But I always use nonslip shoes, and out of my last 5 pairs, these are the worst non slip soles I’ve had. You can tell they’re better than a regular running or hiking shoe sole, but hoka, keen, doc Martin, sieka, and crocks, are all way better and safer.I would say a fair price for these shoes would be about $19.99.I’m looking back at this review and feeling so bad because it’s so negative. But really if you get these shoes you will see for yourself. I do plan on getting the upgraded version of these nonslip. They’re almost twice as expensive, but hopefully they’re worth it.

Nice nonslips for restaurant work, a bit more stylish than many other options out there. Very much true to size. If you normally wear size X, buy these in that same size  X to wear with a light to medium thickness sock.Can’t speak to durability just yet as they are still fairly new.

They were the most comfortable non slip shoes I could find, but they only lasted 9 months. Now they're killing my feet. I'm gonna have to get some new one's, but I'm gonna have to get a cheaper brand.

title: New Balance Womens Fresh Foam X More V5
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, with one noting they don't feel the ground at all, and appreciate their quality and cushioning, particularly for sore and achy feet. The shoes receive positive feedback for pain relief, helping with sciatic pain in both hips, and offer great arch support. Customers like the color options, with one mentioning they come in six different colors to match scrubs. Regarding size and fit, while some find them true to size with a wide toebox, others report sizing issues and not enough room for the actual foot.

Review.review: It took 10 or 11 days to finally get these sneakers. !  Got them today, tried them on. You don't feel the ground at all. The stack of foam cushion is very high. Makes you taller a bit. These shoes are outstanding. Very impressive. Hope they last and hold up for a long time. I got my regular size and they fit snug, like a half size small. They are narrow too.  Amazing shoes tho.

These shoes are true to size and super squishy soft yet still surprisingly supportive. Great for standing on hard floors and walking. I have not used them for running yet. I mostly wanted them as a comfort & recovery shoe, for which they are well suited. These shoes are the most cushioned and supportive I’ve found. I normally wear Hokas and find these even more comfortable. My feet don’t get tired. I struggle with high arches & plantar fasciitis, but these shoes make me forget it.

I just tried on these sneakers, I love them! It feels like I am walking on clouds I will have to buy another pair but in a different color. I can’t be more happier than I am with NB. It’s good to see they have lived up to their name over the years. These shoes are comfortable, and I especially recommend these shoes for my fellow nurses , and also for walking. The shoes are light yet durable and are worth the price you pay.

I love it. It perfectly fits my foot structure and it is super comfortable for people who have plantar fasciitis. I love wearing it when I go out on walks in the early morning because it supports my heel. The material is good quality for a pair of shoes. I ordered these shoes but in black because the white ones are hard to maintain. It is very comfortable when walking. Overall, I would rate this product 5 stars.
These shoes are comfortable and well made. Of course, their New Balance. They  are sturdy yet light weight! I would recommend these to anyone.

This shoe was beautiful!! I loved the color and the gold stitching. The bottom of the shoe had great support and was comfortable. The issue for me was in the toe box. I ordered my normal size for NB 7.5Wide, but this shoe was so tight in the toe box, and especially across the top of my foot, it felt so tight. I really liked the shoe, so I was bummed to return it.

I absolutely love these sneakers! I have been having so much foot pain from plantar fasciitis and heel spurs, and I wasn’t having any luck with finding something that felt GOOD on my feet until I saw these, read the description and the reviews and thought I’d give it a try. I am very glad I did because I bought them in another color as well. They are super comfortable, lots of cushion for sore and achy feet, my orthotic inserts fit just fine when the original insoles were removed. The first time I put these sneakers on I literally sighed in relief. I definitely need more of these in all the colors! 🫶🏻 I recommend if you are experiencing foot pain and if you have a wide sized foot like I do. I found these in my wide size and in colors that aren’t boring or 👎🏻! Woohoo! Bonus! As a teacher I wish I had found these before school ended! Thank goodness they will be in my wardrobe ready for the end of August!

I got these shoes for a trip where I knew I was going to be walking a lot. I usually have knee pain after walking more than 2 miles so I was prepared to invest to ensure I was comfortable. I walked >5 miles every on a 3 week trip and had no pain at all for the entire time. I’m used to my feet aching at the end of the day but that never happened! This is my new favorite pair of shoes, and I always reach for them. They’re the perfect low drop, wide toe box and supportive shoe.One thing I would say is I originally got a wide but it still felt a bit snug so I had to exchange for an X-Wide.They are also a bit chunky so just be aware, but overall I think it helps with stability and balance. If you’re okay with trading some style points for extreme comfort this is the shoe for you.

title: New Balance Men's FuelCell Propel V5 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, with one mentioning running 5k's with no soreness, and appreciate their excellent quality, arch support, and stylish design. The cushioning receives mixed feedback, with some praising the great cushioning while others find it too spongy. The fit and stability also get mixed reviews - while some find them true to size, others note they're too narrow for wide feet, and while they hold up well for weekly walks, some report lack of stability.

Review.review: Did a search for best running shoes, and these came up. They are great. Very comfortable, and supporting. Won't be my last pair. I wear them for walking, running, cycling, and strength training. They fit as advertised. Seem very durable. Designed extremely well.
My husband says these shoes are very comfortable. He has a size 15 wide and that’s fit perfect and have a lot of cushion.

Absolutely love these shoes.  I run 25-30 miles per week and usually training for 10ks up to marathon distances.  My go-to the last few years have been brooks (ghost and Hyperion elite) but decided to give New Balance a try. I’m so glad I did as these are the perfect trainer, and the price tag is a lot easier on the wallet.  They have great cushioning, great balance and lots of spring.  Going to go ahead and get a few pairs to have on hand.

The drop on the v5 feels slightly higher than the v4, but is still sufficiently mid-drop. I could tell when I put them both on one after the other (despite both being labeled as 6mm drop).The v5 wide seems a touch wider in the forefoot than the v4 wide, which is good for me.  I feel like the heel fits better on the v5 than the v4  (my heel is narrow-ish btw).  The v5 is also noticeably more comfortable overall to my foot.The TPU plate gives you decent bounce to your step and yet a stable feeling while the foam is still very soft & comfortable.  Very good combination.My only complaint is that there could be maybe a touch more space where my big toe goes on my right foot only (my right foot is a hair longer than my left it seems based upon my past experience with shoes).  There seems to be just a touch less space (either length, width, or height) at this precise exact spot in the v5 than there was in the v4, because I did not experience this sensation at all in the v4.Overall though, great quality for the price, there's no doubt.

This is my firsy time trying New Balance.I am building up my health and have started my morning walks of nearly 5 miles each day. I am so impressed with the support and cushion, they are better than all the adidas shoes I've worn in the past.I want to start running again and these shoes will certainly help me to get back without any issues.I'm sold on New Balance and looking forward to more in the future.

I bought these as a complement to my NB Rebel v4's as while that is a great shoe, I noticed if I alternate a day between wearing the foam seems to recover better between wears.  Now for these, they are a touch heavier than the Rebels, but I find them just as comfortable for daily wear.  I did replace the laces as I dont car for NB laces in general (tend to stretch to much for my liking).  Overall a great everyday shoe as I tend to gravitate towards NB due to their comfort for my particular foot shape. I will likely buy another pair if I can catch them on sale again.Highpoints:Sizing - Spot on with my SZ15Width - If you have a wider than "normal" foot get the wide sizeComfort - Very comfortableStyle - I dig plain these (also prefer mostly gray shoes)Value - Could not pass on these being $60 below retail when I bought themDurability - to be determined, while my Rebel v4's foam has held up well it has stained on the bottom due to road running and walking, but not a big issue to me.
In your mid 40’s, running a 5k without real soreness afterwards, not much more you can ask for from a shoe.  Comfortable and light with solid support.  Ended up buying two pairs.
Too narrow for a wide shoe.  Shoes look nice and good quality.  Width is too narrow compared to other NB shoes we’ve purchased in the past

title: New Balance Kid's Fresh Foam Roav V1 Lace-up Running Shoe, Black, 7

Review.review: Been a year and half, still think its my best purchase of sneakers till date. Comfort wise its the best and look is pretty slick as well.

My daughter loves these shoes and bought extra pairs that she can grow into. They are lightweight and comfortable for all the activities that she does. I did feel the gray fabric got dirty fast, but that is to be expected when she wears them everywhere... including summer camp.
Very comfortable and fit perfectly
Purchased these for my daughter, she loves them easy to put on and take off. She says they are comfortable and stay tied throughout the day.

I recently purchased the New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Roav V1 Running Shoes, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. These shoes have exceeded my expectations.First and foremost, the comfort level is off the charts. From the moment I put them on, it felt like I was walking on clouds. What's even more impressive is that there was absolutely no break-in period required. I wore them straight out of the box, and my feet were great from the get-go.One of the standout features for me is how incredibly lightweight they are. It feels like I'm hardly wearing shoes at all. This makes them perfect not only for running but also for everyday wear. Whether I'm hitting the pavement or just going about my daily activities, these shoes provide the support and comfort I need.Another huge plus is how breezy and cool they keep my feet, even during warm weather. The ventilation in these shoes is top-notch, and it really helps in preventing that uncomfortable sweaty feeling. My feet stay cool and fresh throughout the day.And let's not forget about style. These shoes are not only functional but also incredibly stylish. I've received compliments on their sleek design, and they easily pair with both athletic wear and casual outfits. They're versatile enough to suit any occasion.In conclusion, the New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Roav V1 Running Shoes are a winner in my book. They check all the boxes for comfort, style, and ease of wear. If you're looking for a pair of running shoes that deliver on every front, look no further. These shoes are a game-changer, and I highly recommend them to anyone in need of both performance and style in their footwear.
I love these shoes. I get so many compliments on them and how colorful they are. I wear them for 10 hour shifts on cement floors and go home with my feet still feeling good.
Daughter loves them. Great for running XC.
Comfortable and affordable. They are lightweight and breathable. I wear them just about every day.

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam X Evoz V4 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, with one noting their feet don't ache after a full day of wear. The shoes receive positive feedback for their arch support, appearance, quality, and color variety. Customers disagree on the fit, with some finding it true to size while others say it's too narrow. The cushioning receives mixed reviews, with some praising the forefoot cushioning while others find it minimal. Customers appreciate the shoes' suitability for various activities, with one mentioning they're perfect for nursing and healthcare work.

Review.review: These shoes are a lifesaver for long shifts on my feet! They’re supportive, lightweight, and super comfortable from the moment I put them on. No break-in period needed, and my feet don’t ache after a full day. Easy to clean and professional looking too—perfect for nursing and healthcare work. Highly recommend!

Review.review: Old, tired, new knees, like to walk in the woods for exercise - that describes me.Great fit, great comfort, aggravating laces - that describes these shoes.Got a great price on these. Only downside is the lace "system", the laces drop through the eyelets to a cord loop that makes adjusting them a bit of a pain. Folks,I am 57 years old, and have been buying New Balance sneakers for well over 3 decades..I have always appreciated the company’s dedication to providing a high quality product that ‘everyone can wear’ to get good foot support – walking, jogging, running, or even hiking – instead of just selling out and peddling high priced sneakers with celebrity sports star endorsements..As I get older, I don’t like ‘white sneakers’ as much as I used to.. Too hard to keep clean!! LOL..And, sometimes I would even complain –Hey! New Balance! Love your sneakers!! But can you please stop with the new model numbers every few weeks? Good Lord! The 608s became 623s, and on and on!!Hey, New Balance!!! I just want a pair of sneakers, not a Bingo game!! LOL..Anyway, I went shopping on Amazon for a new pair of New Balance sneakers.. No white.. I wanted a pair with some color that would not need to be scrubbed with a ‘Mr. Clean Magic Eraser’ every time I walked on my lawn to fill the birdfeeder..And I saw these sneakers..New Balance Dynasoft Tektrel V1 Trail Running Shoes..And I fell in love!New Balance was offering them in a variety of colors, but the ‘Black Phantom Magnet’ color really appealed to me, so I took a chance and ordered a pair..Couple of notes –** I ordered these on December 12, and they just came on February 4.. But they were worth the wait!** Fit is -as always from New Balance - as expected!** Superb quality materials and construction, as always!** My pics cannot do these sneakers justice.. They are simply wonderful, and they look great – even out of the box before I bothered tying the laces!!** I cannot rate their performance on a hiking trail yet, but the ‘design of the soles’ on these sneakers looks to be ‘aggressive’ enough to handle many different surfaces, providing excellent traction while also providing support and comfort to the foot..** The ‘lacing structure’ of these sneakers is really cool!! The laces lace up at both the ‘tongue’ of the sneaker and the sides of the sneaker all the way down to the top of the sole.. The whole thing looks nice and I would imagine also provides extra support..Bottom Line – I highly recommend these sneakers! Another great product by the legendary New Balance! 5 Stars!!!

I ordered my regular size converted to mens but and returned /had to go up a half size for a better feel and so glad I did. Ah!!!! I can't say enough about these amazing shoes lol. title: New Balance Mens Fresh Foam X Hierro V9
Customer_say: Customers find these trail running shoes comfortable, well-made, and easy to walk in, with great style. The cushioning and support receive mixed feedback - while some find the cushioning great and supportive, others report instability issues while running. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding them true to size while others say they run small.

Review.review: I'm really impressed! They've quickly become a favorite for my off-road adventures, thanks to a fantastic combination of design, fit, and price. Right out of the box, the design caught my eye. New Balance really nailed the aesthetic on these—they look sleek and trail-ready without being overly bulky. It's a shoe that performs well and looks good doing it.When it comes to fitting, these shoes truly shine. They hug my feet comfortably, providing a secure and supportive feel that's crucial on uneven terrain. My feet feel locked in without being constricted, allowing for confident strides whether I'm climbing or descending. The cushioning feels just right, absorbing impact without sacrificing responsiveness.And the price? Absolutely spot on. I feel like I got a premium trail running shoe without breaking the bank, which is always a win. My only minor critique, and it's a small one, is that they're a little tight on the side of my feet. While the overall snugness is a positive, I do notice a slight pressure on the sides after longer runs. It's not a deal-breaker by any means, and I'm hoping they'll loosen up just a touch with more wear. Despite that minor quibble, I'm genuinely thrilled with my New Balance trail running shoes. They're a comfortable, stylish, and affordable option for anyone looking to hit the trails with confidence. I highly recommend them!

title: New Balance Mens FuelCell Rebel V4
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes to be of high quality, comfortable, and lightweight, with soft soles and good cushioning, particularly suitable for daily training and long-distance running. The shoes receive positive feedback for their appearance and fit, though opinions are mixed - while some find them comfortable during runs, others note the toe box being tight. Durability is also mixed, with some customers reporting good durability while others find them comparable to race shoes in terms of longevity.

Review.review: I have two pairs of this shoe, I bought my first pair after trying them on in a store and I immediately loved the way they felt. I bought my second pair (pictured) from Amazon because the colors are nice, and I needed another pair to use exclusively outside of work. I'm very tempted to buy a few other colors. My other pair is black and white, and I appreciate how the black is slightly purple and the white is slightly grey. Anyway, it's great these shoes caught my eye because they don't just look good. The soles have a soft cushiony feeling and the uppers live up to their name: "FantomFit." They are my favorite shoes for 12 hr shifts as a bedside RN, setting PRs in 1mi and 5k, and going out for food, drink, etc. Although these shoes are cushy, they are also responsive and fast. When running shorter distances I simple don't think much about them and they help me do my thing and yes it's in these shoes I broke my records for 1mi and 5k despite owning carbon shoes Nike Vaporfly 3 and Fuelcell Supercomp Elite v3. Probably because I'm more likely to take these shoes out daily. There are however two things I don't like about these shoes: 1) the upper material seems prone to abrasion, and 2) I'd get sore on long distance. I washed my 1st oair once and used a brush on the upper of the right shoe, little broken fabric filaments are now visible all over the upper hence I simply did not scrub the left one. In general both my pairs do not show much signs of other wear so I think the main thing is to not scrub the uppers. My second issue is that I could run more than 17.3 miles in these shoes. I had bad upper foot pain on two of my long runs in training for my first marathon in December 2024. I suspect, the upper foot pain may have been caused by form modifications from other pain on my soles then knees. Because of this the Adidas Adizero Adios Pro 3 won the toss-up for my marathon shoes. With that said, 17.3 miles is quite a long distance already and there could have been other factors that may have contributed to my pain. I must mention that the Adios is a dedicated road-running shoe and is more expensive. I wouldn't want to work a 12 hour shift in them because they feel funny when not running. I also must mention that these shoes are awesome on the treadmill as well as the road/sidewalk. While $140 isn't cheap, I consider it a good value for how good they are and how how they compare to more expensive shoes.

Let me introduce you to the New Balance FuelCell Rebel v4 in Orange Beige (aka Hot Mango)—a shoe that doesn’t just support your training… it dares you to push harder every time you lace up.From the moment I slid my foot into these, I knew this wasn’t just another daily trainer. The Rebel v4 blends energy, comfort, and style into one beautifully engineered package. It’s the kind of shoe that makes you want to run farther, faster—even when you don’t have to.Performance:Powered by New Balance’s FuelCell foam, the midsole gives you noticeable bounce and propulsion with every stride. Whether I’m doing tempo runs, long efforts, or even just easy miles, it delivers smooth transitions and that addictive “pop” off the forefoot. You don’t just run in these—you glide.Fit & Feel:It hugs the foot like a performance sock, but with room where it matters. The upper is breathable and flexible, yet secure—so your feet stay locked in without feeling cramped. Lightweight, responsive, and just enough cushion to protect without slowing you down.Looks:Let’s talk about that Hot Mango colorway—because this shoe turns heads. The orange-beige palette is fire without being flashy. It’s bold, fast-looking, and absolutely unique. People will ask about them… and you’ll be proud to explain.Versatility:These aren’t just for runners chasing pace goals—they’re a perfect all-day shoe for anyone who lives actively and moves with purpose. I wear them for training and then keep them on for errands or coaching. They’re light, stylish, and ready for wherever the day takes you.Inspiration:The Rebel v4 isn’t just a shoe—it’s a tool for greatness. It reminds you that every run, every rep, every step is part of the process. Whether you’re building toward your first race or chasing a PR, this shoe fuels that forward momentum with every stride.Bottom line:The New Balance FuelCell Rebel v4 in Hot Mango is for those who believe greatness isn’t just a goal—it’s a daily decision. If you want a shoe that supports your grind, rewards your effort, and keeps your fire lit—this is it.Get up. Lace up. Get after it.

I average about 5–6 miles a day, and the FuelCell Rebel V4 has quickly become my go-to running shoe. From the first run, I noticed how lightweight they felt — almost like wearing racing flats, but with enough cushioning to keep my legs fresh even after back-to-back days.The FuelCell foam delivers an energetic, responsive feel that makes pushing the pace effortless. Whether I’m doing an easy run or throwing in some tempo miles, these shoes handle both without missing a beat. The upper is breathable and hugs the foot well without feeling restrictive, which is especially nice on warmer days.Traction is solid on both pavement and light gravel paths, and after a few weeks of daily use, the outsole is holding up well. I also appreciate the balance between speed and comfort — it’s rare to find a shoe that’s this quick but still keeps your feet feeling good after multiple miles.Pros:Extremely lightweight and responsiveFuelCell foam provides both speed and comfortBreathable upper keeps feet coolGreat for daily training and faster runs alikeSolid grip and durability for road runningCons:Minimal stability — not ideal if you need extra supportOutsole may wear faster for heavier runners or rough terrain useBottom Line:If you want a daily trainer that feels like a performance shoe, the FuelCell Rebel V4 is a winner. Perfect for runners logging steady mileage who want to stay light on their feet without sacrificing comfort.

Review.review: This is my husband’s second pair of new balance 515 model  he really likes them because they have a nice style of this model and the color they are very comfortable and fit perfect I have also the same model and they are my favorite shoe since I stand for long periods of time they a really good support and are great for running and walking.
