Review.review: Love these! Look great styled a lot of different ways, and they’re comfy to stand in all day… I’m a hairdresser and I’m commonly on my feet 10-12 hours a day with no downtime. These shoes don’t disappoint at all! I also walk to & from work most days in the summer, so these have been great, so far. I’m a common women’s size 9, and these are true to size!

I bought them for my cousin to wear in the ER. She’s an RN and she’s on her feet for long hours. She needs the comfort, support and durability and these do it for her. She has no complaints about these and she is happy with them.
No better shoe for comfort and support.
I love these shoes, they have become my favorites for exercise and also for a relaxed outfit, perfect quality, size and comfort, I will buy in more colors!!
Son muy lindos y muy cómodos , me encantaron
Very comfortable and true to size,I get alot of compliments whenever I wear it.
Great shoes, wrong size purchased. Did pay extra for faster shipping and the item still came late.
Me pareció bien

title: New Balance Women's Dynasoft Nitrel V5 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these shoes great-looking and appreciate their support, particularly noting how well they support the heel. The shoes receive positive feedback for their cushioning, with one customer mentioning excellent shock absorption, and many find them lightweight. Comfort and fit receive mixed reviews - while some find them super comfortable, others say they're very uncomfortable on their feet, and while some report a great fit, others find them too tight. The size also gets mixed feedback, with some saying they size well while others find them too small.

Review.review: Bought these shoes for my wife as we are looking to start walking more. They are comfortable and do what they are intended. Size was a little tight, but it ended up working out.
Super comfortable for everyday wear and the size, 8 W, is perfect.

Super nice shoe and fit my orthotics. I normally wear a size 9. These were too small. Went up to a 9.5, still a bit too small and toe box hurt my big toe. Went up to a 10 and they were slightly too big (my heel slipped a bit) and tie box still too small. I'm so disappointed because I have a hard time finding shoes that fit with my orthotics and I don't like most of the new balance styles.
Very light weight and comfortable!
Look prettier in person than on website. Good fit and arch support. Comfortable. Would definitely buy again!
The company changed the design of the shoe and it is now very uncomfortable on my foot. I will be going to a different brand.

Maybe I got lucky when I purchased my first new balance shoes online in my exact size and it fit perfectly. I've ordered two more pairs since then, from different vendors here, in two different sizes, and they still both still seem to be too small. My podiatrist recommend New Balance for my plantar fasciitis, but I'm beginning to think the brand is probably not as great as they used to be? The inconsistency in sizing is very disappointing. I'm returning the shoes I got because even after ordering a size bigger, I wore them around the kitchen while doing chores and they still seem to be too small.Edit 7/2024I decided to give these another chance and try to break them in. After about 2 weeks of wear, they finally feel normal. I would still suggest to size up at least half a size. Its still pretty snug. I wear them to work, but I wouldn't choose these shoes if I were to hike or walk long distances.
Firm, yet comfy

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam 510 V6 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their good arch support and nice colors. The fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some say they run true to size, others find them very narrow. Customers disagree on the feel, with some describing them as soft and squishy while others find them hard. Durability is also mixed, with some saying they hold up well while others report them falling apart.

Review.review: I recently bought the Women's 510 Running Shoe from New Balance, and I couldn't be more pleased with my choice. During my runs, these shoes have provided me with more support and comfort than I had anticipated.The midsole's cushioning is excellent, delivering a responsive feel that deflects impact without being overly soft. My knees have occasionally been sore, but ever since I started wearing these shoes, I've noticed a noticeable change in how they feel after my runs.Even on slippery or uneven conditions, the outsole maintains outstanding traction. With every step, I feel secure and solid, which frees me from anxiety about slipping or sliding and lets me concentrate on my run.These sneakers' breathability is just another fantastic quality. Even during extended runs or in warm weather, the upper mesh material keeps my feet cool and dry. No more uncomfortable and hot feet!In terms of sizing, I discovered that these shoes fit true to size and offer a secure and supportive fit without being oppressive. The design is fashionable and I value the range of color choices that let me select a pair that goes with my running gear.
New Balance is my favorite sneaker.  This is well made but a little wide.  I bought my usual size but they seem a little wider than usual.

The New Balance Women's Fresh Foam 510 V6 Trail Running Shoe are very nice and very comfortable.  I prefer a wide toe box.  I bought these in a wide size and they are wide enough for me to spread my toes.  If you like a really soft squishy shoe with a lot of arch support, these are great.  For me they were too squishy and archy and it made my feet work harder to walk in, which was bothersome.  The good part is the insoles can be removed.  Once I removed the insoles they were much more comfortable for me.
Great price. Very comfortable.

I have been buying New Balance Shoes for the better part of two decades.  They were my go to shoe because they fit my feet and were economical.  This is the second time I have had the exact same problem with these shoes.1.5 months ago, I ordered a similar style shoe only to find that they squeaked.  I did not end up returning them because I felt it would be a hassle.  So I ordered a second pair, this pair.Within a week, they are squeaking as well.  I understand the need to keep costs down, but they are compromising in the wrong areas.  New Balance has now lost a costumer.

I like these shoes very much, except for the insoles.  They fit me like I expected.  I need wide, and New Balance is one of the few brands with wide sizes that actually feel wide.  I have an average arch, and this shoe has the right amount of arch for me.  The shoes are well made and have a nice tread.  I have worn these hiking and camping several times and wear them often for just normal wear.  The shoes are not advertised as waterproof but do seem to be water repellent.  I have not submerged them in water but have worn them in damp conditions, and my feet remained dry.Now for the negative, the insoles.  The insoles are textured. The original packaging indicated the insoles were massaging.  I found the texture mildly annoying from the beginning but livable.  After only 4 months, the insoles became very annoying.  I could feel the texture a lot.  The insoles seemed to become hard.  My feet began to hurt quite a lot.  I was disappointed that I might have to discontinue using the shoes.  I took the simple, flat, thin foam insoles out of another pair of shoes to try in them, and the pain and discomfort immediately stopped.  I'm going to buy a cheap pair of thin foam cushion insoles for this pair of shoes, so I can continue to use them.  The shoes look almost new and show very little wear on the tread. Another problem with the insoles was that they squeaked with every step.  That is no longer a problem with the original insoles removed.

These sneakers are great!! They not only give great support but are very comfortable. They have just enough grip to make you feel secure but not stuck to the road. I love the way they look with multiple outfits, because the accent colors are subtle but bold enough to be beautiful! Definitely a great selection for a running shoe.
Super cómodas y bonita según la foto

title: New Balance Women's Dynasoft Tektrel V1 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, good-looking with nice colors, and appreciate their quality and grip, particularly noting excellent traction on loose gravel. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some say the size is right, others find them a bit too narrow. The arch support also gets mixed reviews, with some praising it while others report little to no arch support.

Review.review: These trail runners are *almost* perfect. They’re lightweight, super comfortable right out of the box, and have amazing grip on wet or uneven terrain. Plus, they look really cool - I seriously love them.The only downside? They run crazy small.I’ve been a solid size 10 my entire adult life, and I had to try on three different sizes before finding the right fit… which ended up being a size 11 Wide. I’ve never worn an 11W before; usually that size feels like clown shoes on me. But for some reason, the 11W in this shoe fits perfectly.My advice? Size up at least a half-size, but honestly, most people will probably need to go up a full size. I bought them in two colors, and both required sizing up.

These running shoes completely exceeded my expectations. I’ve been using them for road running for several weeks now, and the difference is incredible. The cushioning is just right — soft enough to absorb impact on hard pavement, but still responsive and supportive.They’re incredibly lightweight, which makes each stride feel smooth and effortless. The grip on asphalt is excellent, even in slightly wet conditions, and the breathability keeps my feet cool and dry during long runs.The fit is snug without being tight, and I love how stable they feel, especially during quick turns or intervals. After trying several brands over the years, I can confidently say these are among the best running shoes I’ve owned. Highly recommended for any serious runner or even beginners looking for quality and comfort!

Finally, a Stylish and Comfortable Sneaker That Works for Flat Feet!I've gone through so many sneakers over the last few years—most were either uncomfortable or just plain ugly. I have flat feet, and one foot tends to roll inward and ache if I stand too long. I usually wear orthotics, so I ordered these in a wide size, expecting them to be tight, but they actually fit great. In hindsight, I probably could’ve gone with a 9 wide instead of a 9.5 wide.Arch Support:Surprisingly good! My foot feels stable and supported—no inward rolling.These are super stylish and genuinely comfortable. No joke—finally a pair I want to keep wearing!
Overall look is great but this are cut small and I advise you to order at least a half size larger than your normal size. They are very comfortable just are shorter in size/length.

They're really nice shoes, overall. I got a size 10 in wide and the size fit well. They're really lightweight and they're great shoes for the cost. The grip on the bottle is what I was looking for to wear on normal hiking trails. Like any normal shoe, you definitely have to break them in. When I initially put them on, I was worried that I'd have to return them cause they were tight and didn't seem wide enough but I wore them around my house for a bit, relaced them a few times as they adjusted, and now they're fine and comfortable. The cushioning in the shoe is amazing and comfortable, very soft and nice to walk in.

I was a little concerned that reviewers were saying they ran small but I ordered same size I wear in nike and they are perfect. I have high arches though and there's not that much support but this is a common problem for me regardless of brand.

Nice looking shoe.  Not as much cushion as I like...they don't have much arch support and just feel flat inside. The tongue is old school: not 'socks fit'. VERY difficult to loosen and tighten because of the way they lace down the sides...I'll have relace them so they lace like a normal shoe.
My new favorite, comfort, width and the colors are so beautiful shoes

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam Garoe V1 Trail Running Shoe

The shoes receive positive feedback for their color and walking ability, with one customer highlighting their effectiveness on uneven terrain. Customers disagree on the fit, with some finding them true to size while others say they're very narrow, and durability opinions are mixed.

Review.review: I love the style and the fit, I wear a size 9. I love the look and how they feel on my feet. The only thing is I suffer from fasciitis and Sciatica. So I had to buy special inserts to put in the shoe's. Over all these are a pretty good shoe, they are good for long walks. I do not know if they are a good running shoe seeing I do not run.
Stylish, breathable and comfy.  Love these shoes!!!!  The mesh is almost a dark hunter green/light black.  They’re sweet 👍

I am a plus size woman and struggle to find shoes that fit and last. New Balance have been my go to brand for quite a while. Was disappointed when I couldn't find any durable ones that were fashionable until I bought the New Balance Garoe Trail Running shoes. I bought them Jan 4, 2024 and am still wearing them almost daily in October. I am ordering a new pair as we speak but will continue to wear these until they are completely done. Thank you New Balance for making this design. The fit, comfort, and durability are unmatched for the price!

I got the black w/sea salt flecks... pretty cool and kooky looking sneakers. I have another pair of NB sneakers which are GREAT for walking so I bought these as well. I am narrow feet 8.5-9, and the 9 regular width NB fit me fine. I can put a thin additional insole for my heel, and I wear thin to medium socks and all is well.The only little thing is the heel of the sole has quite the funky bit sticking out behind- so much so that when i am walking downstairs I can often feel the heel rubbing on the stair risers behind my foot.. bit of an odd sensation but not consequential.Overall I like these and would buy again as long as they are on sale. The black with 'sea salt' flecks are very fun looking and extremely comfortable for me for walking miles and miles on pavement and asphalt like i do.

9.5 wide.  This is one of the best pair of NB shoes I own, and I own a lot of them.  I just rarely get rid of them.  I ordered a half size larger, which is the usual, since they run a bit smaller than other brands.  They are vey cushy and yet stable on the sides.  This one does have the wide toe box and narrow heel, which they never publish, so its a crapshoot.  I'm going to order another pair.

Well I was looking for good shoes for people on their feet all day.  Among all the brands I couldn't afford,  I saw that New Balance is recognized by podiatrists. I can afford New Balance, I thought. I still spent $90 on these shoes titled Fresh Foam. I expected softness, foamy, cloud like comfort when i put my foot inside . I got none of that.  In fact, the shoe felt hard as a rock in the bottom. I guess the fresh foam refers to the bottom that you stand on. The phrase fresh reminds me of the 80's just like this scribble, paint design on the bottom of the shoe. I must've missed that in the picture. I found it ugly and immediately colored over that with a black market. So now I have spent almost $100 on shoes that I find to be rather uncomfortable and ugly. I've given it a couple weeks now and I can say these things: the toe protect is just a waterproof barrier but keeps toes from getting wet in puddles.  These do NOT qualify as slip resistant and will in fact send you skating . The main body of the shoe is net which I didn't notice when ordering. Not the warmest shoes for winter. I wouldn't recommend these to anyone and I wouldn't buy them again either.  I'm still on the hunt for some good shoes that make my feet happy. This foam isn't fresh enough for me.
Love the colors and design! Remind me of LSU colors!

I work 12 + hour shifts in a hospital and I was looking for a shoe to alternate with my xlogs for work. I tried some of the trendy brands out there, but none of them felt as comfy as these ones. I did size up and it seemed that they ran a little small and pinched my toe when I bought them in my normal size. I have narrow to average width feet, so maybe these just have a super narrow toe bed? I find these quite comfortable after a long day and will most likely purchase again.

title: New Balance Kids Fresh Foam 650 V1 Lace-up Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes to be a solid choice with a wide fit that accommodates kids' feet, and they appreciate their comfort, style, and color options. The wearability receives positive feedback, with one customer noting they're perfect for cross country and road running training. While some customers say they last for months, others report they fall apart within a month, and opinions on value are mixed.

Review.review: Very nice shoes. Purchased as a gift for granddaughter.After much searching for sneaker in color - black. Her 2nd choice.Appearance: met her expectations for color, comfort.Fit: true to sizeDurability: (+)  kids run through shoes so fast due to style changes.The shipping of this item was delayed even though when purchased had Amazon’s typical deliver time frame. Waited for arrival and when status wasn’t changed, called in to find out ‘what was going on’ and rep made some changes and shipped with a few days.Not normally an issue with Amazon stated delivery date but was resolved.
Great sneaker!
Amazing for wide feet. Lasted a long time, great fit. Used for Catholic school and they looked great.
Comfortable but shoelaces are the problem in almost all new balance shoes. Laces untie themselves. New balance - please do something about it!
So comfortable and cute
Awesome fit
Great show

These shoes were delivered to me on Oct. 21st.. not even 2 months from the purchase date and they are already falling apart.The pros, they are cute, comfortable and nicely wide for my kid's feet. They looked nice when first opened and out of the box.The cons, the front part comes unsewed or unglued.My kid wears these shoes to go to school. He is very active, but has his own set of separate shoes for his other sports, baseball, soccer, football etc.The wear and tear of these shoes comes simple from everyday wear at school. I don't think a pair of shoes he's worn has lasted so little time.The front of the shoes are coming undone. I am now to find some shoes to replace these for another quarter. They looked nice enough, but they are not made for an active kid. These were "running shoe" definitely didn't hold on that. He does do running club.I would NOT recommend these shoes for an active kid, not even a runner. They are not made to last. They are not worth what you paid for.

title: New Balance Kid's Fresh Foam Roav V1 Lace-up Running Shoe, Black, 7
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, well-made, and perfect for wide feet, with great arch support and a lightweight design. They appreciate the look and consider them good value for money. However, durability is a concern, with multiple customers reporting that the shoelace loops and string holders broke off within weeks of use.

Review.review: Been a year and half, still think its my best purchase of sneakers till date. Comfort wise its the best and look is pretty slick as well.

My daughter loves these shoes and bought extra pairs that she can grow into. They are lightweight and comfortable for all the activities that she does. I did feel the gray fabric got dirty fast, but that is to be expected when she wears them everywhere... including summer camp.
Very comfortable and fit perfectly
Purchased these for my daughter, she loves them easy to put on and take off. She says they are comfortable and stay tied throughout the day.

I recently purchased the New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Roav V1 Running Shoes, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. These shoes have exceeded my expectations.First and foremost, the comfort level is off the charts. From the moment I put them on, it felt like I was walking on clouds. What's even more impressive is that there was absolutely no break-in period required. I wore them straight out of the box, and my feet were great from the get-go.One of the standout features for me is how incredibly lightweight they are. It feels like I'm hardly wearing shoes at all. This makes them perfect not only for running but also for everyday wear. Whether I'm hitting the pavement or just going about my daily activities, these shoes provide the support and comfort I need.Another huge plus is how breezy and cool they keep my feet, even during warm weather. The ventilation in these shoes is top-notch, and it really helps in preventing that uncomfortable sweaty feeling. My feet stay cool and fresh throughout the day.And let's not forget about style. These shoes are not only functional but also incredibly stylish. I've received compliments on their sleek design, and they easily pair with both athletic wear and casual outfits. They're versatile enough to suit any occasion.In conclusion, the New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Roav V1 Running Shoes are a winner in my book. They check all the boxes for comfort, style, and ease of wear. If you're looking for a pair of running shoes that deliver on every front, look no further. These shoes are a game-changer, and I highly recommend them to anyone in need of both performance and style in their footwear.
I love these shoes. I get so many compliments on them and how colorful they are. I wear them for 10 hour shifts on cement floors and go home with my feet still feeling good.
Daughter loves them. Great for running XC.
Comfortable and affordable. They are lightweight and breathable. I wear them just about every day.

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam X Cruz Artisan V3 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, cute looking, and easy to slip on and off. They are lightweight and receive positive feedback for their quality. However, customers disagree on the support level, with some reporting minimal support. Moreover, the sizing is problematic, with customers describing them as too small and extremely tight. Additionally, the wear resistance is concerning, with multiple customers reporting that the shoes only lasted two months.

Review.review: These are by far the most comfortable shoes that I own. I'm on my feet all day at work & since wearing these my feet never hurt at the end of the day. Great support & looks great. Decent heel height.
Beautiful, comfortable shoes that were too small. Go a size up. Great for narrow feet
Shoes didn’t fit well, were not comfortable, offered minimal support and cheap quality.

Love the fresh foam products. Very picky about shoes bc of pain but these are comfortable and lightweight. Easy to walk or stand in for a long time but this particular also looks nice with a nicer outfit or for exercise.

Overall these are comfortable and stylish for work, running errands or going on walks.  I don’t think they’re ergonomic enough for regular running.  Also they run exceptionally small.  I’m typically a 9.5/10D (but can often wear normal width) and these shoes were quite tight when I first purchased in a 10.5D.  As long as I wear thin socks they are comfortable now but I don’t like the sizing guessing game.

Item is exactly as appears quality wise they look very well made. I wear women’s 7.5 and size was precise. However every time you try to take the shoes off the inserts slide out. And there’s nothing under them so you can’t just leave them out. They are very hard and scratchy on the ankles. So in the end they are great for appearance but not every day wear.

I love these. They are stylish, light-feeling, and easy to slip on and off (even while tied) after wearing a few times. I do not recommend them for long distance running, but I didn’t buy them for that reason so I am very happy. I wear them for bike rides but also to go out. Very versatile for my lifestyle (but I also never dress up and pretty much live in leggings so there’s that).

I work in healthcare so I’m on my feet all day and these shoes feel like walking on clouds. This is the 3rd pair I’ve gotten. I have a high arch and these are so supportive which helps with foot/knee pain. Only downside for me is the fabric around the toe area wears down fast but it could be the amount of wear put on them daily. Still love em tho!

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam X More V6 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable and well-cushioned, with good quality for everyday use. The shoes are true to size. Opinions about the height are mixed, with one customer noting the sole is too high.

Review.review: SUPER COMFY!! Perfect for everyday use, super lightweighted feels like you're walking on clouds. The color just like the picture! You can style it with everything

I didn’t know just how much I needed these shoes! Firstly, I need the X-wide size and New Balance is one of the few brands that carry them. Secondly, I recently broke my toe and these foam shoes cushion it just enough to allow me to walk the distance I was accustomed to walking prior to the break (and it’s only been a little over 2 weeks from the injury). Definitely recommend.

I think these are great for a soft shoe! I like the wide base because it feels more stable. It’s definitely tall and soft! I think it’ll take some getting used to if you’re used to wearing something like a Hoka Bondi 8/9 or a Brooks ghost max 2.Overall it’s very comfortable and a good walking shoe! And it’s true to size! I’d definitely recommend this, especially for people with wider feet, bigger runners and walkers like myself !
Been a nurse for years, comfiest shoes I have ever worn.
I love these shoes because it protects the ball of my foot which gets very bad corns and callouses.  It keeps the pressure off.  Very good shoe with lots of great padding.
Sent a dirty, worn pair in a non descriptive box.

I'm a preschool teacher and I'm on my feet all day. I usually only wear Hoka's, but thought I'd give these a try. I'm so disappointed. These do not compare to HOKA at all! The sad part is that these were more expensive than my HOKAS! After wearing the NB all day, my feet hurt! 😭

True to size. Comfort is pretty good, about the same as any other NB sneaker but way more cushion. The height of the sole was just too high and bouncy for me, but may be fine for others. The color in the photo looked more purplish blue and bright which I was excited about but once I got them they were just a muted navy.

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam X Hierro V8 Gore-tex Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable and waterproof.

Review.review: These are fantastic! I work outside and the waterproof goretex is amazing. I also have wide feet and these have a wide option. These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned.If you're on the fence about these, pull the trigger and start enjoying them.

Had for 3 months now and the Fit is amazing!! I have never been able to find wide shoes till now.  Very comfortable just like all the hoka or other styles that look similar to this.  Have never had them in deep water just rain and grass dew seem to be good in the water.
Really is water tight, lightweight, keeps feet warm, and sole has really good traction. Wish they came as slip ons.

These really don't feel like they have Fresh Foam X in them. The cushioning is very disappointing. The waterproofing seems decent and they fit as expected. Will update in the future to comment on durability.
Lucen lindos en la foto, pero son duros, calurosos, no los encuentro para nada cómodos, quisiera devolverlos

The shoes feel great & comfortable. However the sole started to come off about 3 months after buying them. I bought them because they’re “waterproof” but how is it waterproof & already coming apart??. For the amount of money i spent you think you’d be good for at least half a year but nope. Now the sole is basically off the shoe and only holds from front of the shoe & parts where the design touches the sole.

Overall decent shoes, but the sole feels very ridged and the heel is unusually tall. Tall to the point my girlfriend commented on it. Tall to the point of feeling a bit unstable and the slope of the sole from heel to toe is very noticeable and odd. I prefer other NB shoes I’ve had in the past with a more cushioned, neutral, standard feeling sole.

title: New Balance Men's Dynasoft Nitrel V6 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, durable, and well-made. They appreciate the perfect fit and width, with one customer specifically noting the wide toe design.

Review.review: The shoe looks and feels good. I use them mainly for long walks and they have held up well after a full summer of use. They feel comfortable enough to run in but since that is not my usage, I can't comment on them as trail runners.
Love these shoes so comfortable and perfect fitWide toe too
Front left part of the shoe is already ripped with very little wear and tear. I don’t even wear these every day.
Bought these for my 12-year-old he loves them wear them all the time. They seem to be durable and fit  well.

I love these shoes I have a extra wide foot thanks to a bunion but these are perfect in the width. These also have a better arch than any other New Balance I have bought as I tend to roll my ankle and the arch on these seem to help that a ton.This is the 2nd pair of these I have bough and most likely I will get a 3rd if still available.
True to size. Husband lives them
omg! so comfortable!!

Al inicio las sentí robustas y algo duras en el material, pero con el uso todo cambió. No tienen una amortiguación excepcional, pero en cuanto a calidad y materiales están súper bien. Después de varios meses, sigo muy satisfecho con la compra.

title: New Balance Men's Dynasoft Nitrel V6 Gore-tex Trail Running Shoe, Black/Black/Phantom, 11.5

Review.review: Quality is pretty decent. I like the style of the shoes. True size and comfortable for wide feet. It doesnt feel heavy for a GORE-TEX shoes.

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Garoé V1 Midcut Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, lightweight, and waterproof, with one mentioning they're perfect for wet weather. They appreciate the quality, with one customer noting they can wear them all day without another insole, and they like the style, with one highlighting the cool blue details. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding them great while others say they're way too narrow.

Review.review: Took to UK and Ireland. Great ankle support walking on cobble streets and uneven castle stairs.  Feet stayed dry walking in wet grass. Comfortable.  Great walking shoe. Walked for miles on some days and feet were happy.  I'm VERY happy I got these shoes for this adventure.  :-)

Very comfortable and well-finished, not for all-day use as they may cause fatigue. A negative aspect for people who ride motorcycles: the back part of the sole can be uncomfortable since it hits the pedals. 9/10.

Months (almost a year) ago, with some foot problems, I went and purchased two pairs of New Balance Hierro mid-height running shoes that had NB's Fresh Foam construction. Instant comfort - spectacular! Those shoes happily breathe so they're great through the summer, but understandably not wind resistant or waterproof. Then I discovered this shoe (Garoe - another strange name) on amazon. It is truly spectacular. It does everything I'd want a shoe to do. For living in these casual days this shoe, in black with its cool blue details can almost serve as your everything-but-a-wedding shoe. Unless it was a casual wedding! I've run in them, ridden my bike, walked miles. I am most happy. Maybe the best shoe ever, for me. Do make sure you purchase the GORE TEX model. It has a label on its side and the price is a wee bit higher than the non-Gore Tex version. Worth it.

Built just like tennis shoes, except they're waterproof. Sole is really soft, and while comfortable, I don't believe they will be real durable. Also I hate the heel design. It sticks out, and it hits things all the time. Like walking on steps, the heels will rub the riser.They are very comfortable, and cushion every step. Definitely a pavement shoe, but your feet will be comfortable.
Perfect comfortable, waterproof shoes for my husband's job. Easy to clean big emphasis on how comfortable they are.

I bought this set of hiking boots for my adult son, who needed something stylish, yet waterproof.  He loves the look, the protection it offers and how light, supportive and comfortable they are.  Fit was perfect and consistent with other New Balance products he owns.
Not as nice as my other pair of NB hikers but they are comfy
Thx

title: New Balance Unisex-Child FuelCell Propel V5 Lace-up Running Shoe

Review.review: My wife has size 4 feet, these feel like they take a lot of pressure off her knees.
Great comfortable sneaker & greater price.
My son loves them.  Very comfortable for wide feet
These are some of the best tennis shoes I’ve ever purchased. I just got into working out religiously and these are great for cardio! Super bouncy and comfortable.

title: New Balance Mens Fresh Foam X Hierro V1 Mid-Cut
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable and excellent for hiking, particularly noting their mid-ankle height support and incredible grip that provides good traction across different surfaces. The shoes receive positive feedback for their quality and appearance. Regarding fit, while some customers say it matches their size expectations, others mention they run very narrow. Moreover, durability experiences are mixed, with some saying they hold up well while others report issues with the sole separating.

Review.review: I’ve worn em up mountains and also walking around downtown. Comfy, stylish, and I haven’t been able to break them yet. Offers good support for the foot and keeps good traction on loose angled terrain. Size is typical for NB shoes, true to the number. Color is nice, understated. It does the job and looks good free taking a beating.

I had to get the 15 x wide for toe room and width but now the fit is great. Whether I'm walking city streets or forest trails these are comfortable, light weight and support my ankles well. They don't get too hot and don't pick up aot of little stones or dirt. Great model. I looked at lots of different possibilities.Really happy I found these.

I got double wide for this one and New Balance is one of few companies that sell double wide boots. Of course it is Gore-Tex, so you do not have to worry at all to get your feet wet. Both support and tractions are awesome. I did wear this all day several times and it is very comfortable after walking all day. Double wide width fits me nicely and it is a top notch shoe that I can recommend. Try it!

The New Balance Fresh Foam X Hierro Mid is an excellent hiking shoe—comfortable, durable, and perfect for switching between terrains, including water. The grip is solid, and the cushioning makes long hikes much more enjoyable. Whether you’re on rocky trails, muddy paths, or shallow streams, these shoes hold up really well.The only downside is the tongue can be irritating if you’re not wearing long socks. It tends to rub against the skin, which can get uncomfortable over time. But as long as you pair them with the right socks, they’re a fantastic choice for outdoor adventures.Highly recommend for hikers looking for comfort, durability, and versatility!

The price is high but I got a pair half price on Amazon due to limited sizes left in one color. The boot arrived in one day, about 4 hours before a snow storm, so I got to try them out quickly on my 5 mile walk this morning. My area plows their paths so I walked mostly on blacktop with a thin layer of snow/ice. These shoes have amazing grip on slippery surfaces and even in places where I walked through 4 inches of snow the grip was very good. The boots are fairly light weight and I love the fresh foam comfort. They fit well and are waterproof at least in snow. Perfect for my needs. I have a custom insole and it fit nicely inside. The boot with the original inserts does not have much arch support which surprised me.

I would really like a breathable, waterproof hiking shoe but these are not. They are the most water RESISTANT shoes I have purchased on Amazon & certainly worth $50 but not $120. I have goretex outer wear that is impervious to water so it is hard to understand why these were not the same. I did not even test them in rain, standing water, puddles, creeks or streams; only in 4-6 in long grass after a steady rain. Water only seeped in slightly at the toe but if more water, rain or foliage was present it would be worse. On a positive note the shoes are very comfortable. The laces require double tying - irritating. The eyelets in the shoe are not reinforced so the hole is deforming. Other lace “cleats” are a fabric that may be coming loose at the stitching. The top 2 cleats are metal & are fine. There is a “lip” at the bottom rear heal that almost looks like mold forming excess that should have been trimmed. It may serve as a toe pry point to ease remove of shoe. However it collects dirt & sometimes catches on brush. Hope this aids your decision tree.
Not much padding in the footbed. Not terrible, but if you like the feel of Altra or Hoka, you'll hate these.

True to size and is very comfortable to wear. I haven't had any issues with them. I wear them for casual wear in the winter. The Gortex liner makes them warm and dry. I am not able to hike anymore so l don't know how they are for traction, but l would assume they are good due to the lugs on the soles. I am not into style as much as l am into function and these have ankle support that l need.

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam X Vongo V6 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable and appreciate their excellent cushioning, good arch support, and overall quality. They like the style and color, and one customer mentions they help with back pain. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say the extra wide width is perfect, others find them too narrow. The durability is also mixed, with one customer reporting issues with the sole falling apart.

Review.review: I think I waited too long between my last pair of running shoes and my new ones, because the difference in experience is phenomenal. Maybe the foam sole breaks down faster? I'm not sure, this is a new concept to me with my last pair.My new kicks are super comfy. I'm not a runner, but a back pain patient. I pretty much live in a New Balance running shoe or a Mephisto Helen sandal. My trusty physical therapist wants me in a solid wide based sole for stability - check. Good arch support - check. (I also insert my custom orthotics from my podiatrist.) Fits my wide foot well in a wide size - check. Looking good! - check. Got on sale during Prime Days for a great deal - check. (I always purchase a pair of New Balance that lists at $140 or more for construction and durability. The support feels more solid.) Can throw into the washing machine for easy cleaning - check.These running shoes are super comfy and stabilizing, and help my back pain. I recommend.
They look great and fit very well.  Sprained my ankle and these offer the extra support and balance I needed after getting out of the walking boot. Very nice for walking.
Very comfortable, excellent cushioning, great stability shoe and the wide width is great.

Nice shoes that are pretty comfortable right out of the box.  Took one star off as they are not really “breathable” and my feet get super hot in them. These were recommended by my doctor for plantar fasciitis.  My feet still hurt after wearing them but I’m hoping over time they will help.  Good traction walking around on our tile floors.  Fit is true to size.

This is my first pair of New Balance shoes after wearing Mizuno Wave Inspire with an orthotic for moderate over pronation for 13 years. I wanted to start a shoe rotation, hearing that helps prevent injury, so I threw these shoes into my rotation. I also wanted to try to run without my orthotic to take advantage of the newer shoe models and technology that is built into them. I appreciated the comfort and cloud-like feel of these shoes. They have good support, and provide some extra return when pushing off. They are lightweight and comfortable. They provide good stability, although I also purchased the Mizuno Wave Horizon as my second shoe in the rotation, and that shoe is much more stable. The color is nice and the fit is good for me, although I have a more narrow foot. Overall, I am happy with the shoes and recommend them for those with moderate overpronation.
Too wide and soft  not stable enough

Great shoes!  Love New Balance for their arch support, cushion and wide toe box and narrow heal.  Great fit, light weight and durable.  They are really nice looking as well.  I wear them with jeans, shorts etc.  I wear these as everyday shoes to protect my feet and back because of their support.  They don’t have enough cushion for me for running or extra long walks.  I wear the New Balance Fresh Foam X More that provide the additional cushioning that I need for my personal needs.  They are true to size.
Super comfortable

title: New Balance Unisex-Child 1440 V1 Lace-up Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable. The quality receives mixed feedback, with some customers describing them as great while others report poor quality.

Review.review: Very good quality shoes. Well made and comfortable. Very satisfied.
Very nice and the price was great for the quality of shoe. My 7yr old loves how comfortable they are.
True to size and love! My 6 year old complains about all shoes but these she actually likes and says they feel comfortable

This is the second time I’ve ordered these shoes. My son outgrew the last. They are comfortable and go with everything! My son is on the spectrum and has to have comfortable shoes and he loves these ones!
My son loved these, both the color and the fitting.
Very durable and lovely design
Fit perfectly, good material.
So comfy my child loved this so much

title: New Balance Women's Dynasoft Nitrel V6 Gore-tex Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their color. They offer excellent traction and are waterproof to a degree, with one customer noting they're good for winter and rain conditions. The size receives mixed feedback - while some say they run true to size, others find them very narrow. The cushioning receives negative feedback, with one customer noting it's not as thick as expected.

Review.review: These Gortex runners are nice! I absolutely love the color! The tread is amazing! I got these to replace my Nike Pegasus Gortex trainers for running outdoors in the winter. The traction on these is great! They feel lightweight. They keep your foot warm and dry which is exactly what I needed. These are harder- They aren’t as soft as my New Balance Fuel Cell trainers or even my Pegasus but you can’t expect all of that with these being gortex and trail shoes! They are still comfortable! I typically am a solid 8.5 and I did purchase a 9 and honestly could have sized up to a 9.5- My toe is almost right at the top. I put insoles in for added comfort but they pushed my toe so to the top they didn’t work. I typically run 4-5 days a week 3 miles or more and these will definitely do the trick! Keeping my feet dry when running through the slush or rain this winter was exactly what I wanted. I really love this shoe- They are a great buy and so cute on!

I walk all year long and when it's wet/snowy I need something to keep my feet dry. So far I haven't had these out in a heavy rain, but they are waterproof. With that said, they don't seem to breathe very much, and my feet are a little warm/sweaty, but that can be mitigated with the right socks (moisture-wicking). As other reviewers stated, the toe box is a little tighter than you may be used to. My toe is sitting in the normal spot, but the vertical height inside the toe box is a little less than with a different style sneaker. This doesn't bother me, and after about 2 minutes, I don't even notice it. I feel like there was a short "break in" period needed, mainly for the area around the ankle. But that may just be the shape of my foot/ankle? After the first walk in them (~1 mile), they were fine, and I haven't had any issues since. I was originally thinking I'd need an insert to raise up my heel but I've decided I don't need that. I like the color too - not too flashy and not white (to show dirt). They provide ample support for walking, and I would buy them again. I have a high arch and high instep, and the middle of the shoe fits great, very comfortable (I've had issues with this in the past with certain New Balance styles). If you have a wider foot, this may not be comfortable for you though, given the more "sandwiched" toe box feel of the shoe.  I'm looking forward to some puddle jumping to really test them!

waterproof as promised. they are high quality and seem durable, but I haven't worn them for all that long yet. the tread is great for trails - keeps rocks from getting stuck in them. the padding isn't as thick as I would like, but I do like the amount of built in arch support. they run a little small and narrow - you might consider sizing up. my feet slide forward a bit unless I lace them very tightly, but I'm hoping that will change as I finish breaking them in. I'm a dog walker and can walk in these for a couple hours a day without my feet hurting. they get a bit hot due to the waterproofing though so I wouldn't want to wear them all day.

Ever since I had foot surgery, my podiatrist was adamant about sticking with New Balance. Unfortunately, they aren’t always the best looking shoes. But these I love. They give me great support, fit true to size, and are even waterproof to a degree.

They are very nice shoes and I loooove the color. The width is fine and the length is fine but they squish my toes from the top… lol. It’s weird. I’ve never had that problem before. But the more I wear them the more they stretch out so it’s been fine. Definitely waterproof. LOVE THAT. I’m a dog bather so they are perfect.

Nice wide shoe, just what I needed. Color is accurate. Tested with some water and it rolls off. Very comfortable. Just wish the toe box was ever so slightly taller as my toe touches the top sometimes. But, the fabric gives and is soft it's  not too bad and am keeping.
size not according to the shoe, impossible to use
I just wore these before three weeks in very wet Scotland, and didn't get wet feet once. Good grip on wet, slippery rocks.

100% recommend. I’ve walked aeons the house for a few hours and they’re done but I just want to check it out.Arch support:Love for my sciaticaColor:They’re beige and not stark whiteFit:Fit well but will be trying the 8.5, have the 8 just to make sure.Walking ability:Wet comfortableShoe quality:Very well made.

These are the best sneakers I’ve ever owned! They are super comfortable, and I love the hidden wedge that gives a little extra height. The colors are beautiful and stylish. The only thing I wish is that they came in an all-black version — with a black sole as well. If that option were available, I’d buy them right away. It’s just a pity that this color combination isn’t offered.

I have narrow, long feet - women’s 12B - so these shoes are perfect for me. However, compared with other NB shoes, I’d say that these run a bit narrow. The length seems fine though. I just got these shoes today, and I immediately went out for a two mile walk in them: very comfortable! And the platform aspect is cool! There’s no problem with balance for me - I noticed that a couple of reviewers mentioned difficulty with getting used to the platform height. The price is definitely reasonable and the shoes are made in Indonesia.I have worn NB for about 30 or 35 years (for running and walking), and have always found their shoes to be of dependably good quality as well as very comfortable.
These are my favorite sneakers to wear daily! The quality is excellent, and they look exactly like the pictures. Super comfortable and durable, perfect for everyday use. I totally recommend them!

Great pair of shoes! At first I was hesistant to wear them because they are platforms which I am not used to and I intend to wear them at work. My job requires me to be on my feet a lot so I needed something comfortable and safe to wear! I was at first scared to fall in them but so far, it's been very comfortable with enough arch support. I surprisingly got used to wearing these platform sneakers within just a week! A must have for those who needee the extra height without sacrificing comfort.

Perfect! I was looking for platform tennies. These were last on my list because the look was more athletic than what I had in mind. But after trying everything, these are the ones! While I really wanted to like the other styles, I couldn't walk 10 feet without heel slippage. And I want to wear these with everything and alot. They are true to size and no heel slip at all. And your feet don't look like bricks. They are lightweight and flattering. Love the extra lift! I got white/white size 7.

comfortable, do make your feet sore after long hours of walking or standing but they probably just need broken in more or just a little bit better support for your feet! easy to put on, good value and gorgeous shoe overall. quality seems good and the colors are sharp. they are taller so your walking ability may be a little different but it is easy to get used to. function as expected.
I have these in white, so had to get black also. These are amazing shoes, true to size and beyond comfortable!!

title: New Balance Women's FuelCell Summit Unknown V4 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable and of great NB quality. Review.review: Very happy to find these NB non-foam shoes. Last of the old kind. Fit so well, solid and very light. I love these for walking after having both knees replaced, the shoes provide stability. Good grippy bottoms. I have the purple color and these are gray/black, much better color. Weird colors, not pretty, but great shoes. The fit is perfect, great NB quality, and the cushion is fabulous. I have been a loyal Brooks brand wearer when I bought a pair of NB. Brooks do break down faster and go through a break in period whereas the NB are comfy from day one. Not ridiculous priced. Love them.
Super comfortable. Shoes were comfortable throughout my 10 mile hike in AZ and comfortable just walking around casually.  Size was true to size.

I decided to take a chance on these and get a size 8. All of my new balance sneaks are a size 8 the only brands that fit me well for my shoe size is the new balance KAIHA Road fresh foam and the Heirro’s. I know that each brand is different and that not all new balance sneakers fit the same. These sneakers were just a tad small for my feet. The luck was great and it looked like it was manufactured well just too small so I am returning them and will  stick to my regular new balance shoe styles.
Excelente opción

Was excited to get my shoes only to see that they were previously worn, had a leaf in the shoe laces, toe area was creased, bottoms look like they were dirty but wiped clean, second time this happened to me, it's such a let down, people work hard for their money, buy new shoes for necessity and style, but get ripped off, don't know what else to say, let down.

Used for a Tough Mudder 15k. Highly recommend and worth the price. Hardly any rocks got into my shoes and my feet were comfortable the whole run. Fit well. Great material and tread. Order a size or half size up from your normal.

title: New Balance Kid's Rave Run V2 Hook & Loop Shoe

Review.review: So cute! Easy to clean, they can just be thrown in the washing machine, they are light weight, true to size. Good traction, the wearability is great, the toe is smooth rubber so it wont snage when he decides to  crawl instead of walk

I purchased these shoes for my daughter. I loved that they came in a wide as I am conscious about her having shoes that are comfortable keep her feet happy and healthy. I also look for something cute as she is my mini fashionista. These were cute but unfortunately the wrong size arrived and her size had sold when I was looking for an exchange. Otherwise, I was happy about the quality of the shoe and NB is one of our go to brands for style and comfort. Id recommend.

Shoe looks great and it’s easy to strap on child’s foot. Also, this style of New Balance is great if your child wears leg braces. We order the wide option and fits perfectly on our son’s foot while wearing his braces. Great pair of sneakers.
My son wore these daily for ~4 months between 1.5 and 2 and they held up great. I wish New Balance would bring back this color!
Velcro strap needs to be longer. Shoes are nice. Fits well.

My son used to wear vans for the first 3.5 years of his life. But we noticed he walked pigeon toed. After a visit to an orthopedic, he was diagnosed with flat feet, an as result, it was affecting his gait- hence the pigeon toed. He recommended New Balance sneakers, as well as gait plates to correct his walk. These were the first pair I ordered and I am truly happy. The design is really nice- sleek, modern and goes with any type of bottoms. I especially like that the actual inserts are removable and I can stick his plates in there without a problem. He says they are extremely comfortable, even with the plates and the plates themselves are hard plastic. I try to buy them in every color. These do run a little small, so maybe buy a half size up. However, if your kid needs to use inserts, try to buy just the right size to avoid discomfort. These sneakers hold up very well. He wears them everywhere and almost all the time. We have been hiking, to parks and long walks and they still look pretty good. They wash really well too! I don’t think I’m ever going to find something close to this sneaker.
This was sooooo cute. I regret it doesn’t fit my son. I ll keep looking for his size
So I think the shoes are adorable, great color, breathable, and really easy to put on; however, I feel like they run a little small. Other than that I feel that they are a great value for your money.

We love them for our daughter since they can get put on fast for school (when we are rushing out the door) but also offer great support when she is running. Colors look just like the picture!

Excellent shoes my child says that they’re very comfortable. Great value for the money. Shoe seems to be keeping up fairly well towards the end of the school year. Fits fairly well. Easy for my child to put on.
My kids love this shoes , this is 6 years in a row buying this same shoes , easy on and easy off , lots of colors and very comfortable.
My son loves these! He hasn’t gotten the hang of tying shoes yet and the Velcro does not hold up very long with an active boy. These shoes are perfect! He says these are comfortable and fit great.
Easy for a child to tighten. I've not had any problems with the string, which is what worried me when I purchased this style. Light weight, great support, true to size.

Shoe is great and comfortable;however, it almost doesn’t work for kids we ho have a high bridge. My son has a hard time getting his foot in because the string of the boa is not long enough so the shoe doesn’t open up big enough.
So much easier than laces and it looks great. Somehow the tightening wheel and twine don’t warp over many, many uses. Really impressive construction.

title: New Balance Kids' Dynasoft Trail Magic V1 Boa Running Shoe

Review.review: Great hiking shoes! Stood the test after 2 weeks hiking in the rockies and Big Sur. Comfortable, according to my 7 year old, great traction, and easy on/off.

I bought the New Balance Dynasoft Trail Magic V1 running shoes for my five-year-old, and they’ve been fantastic. The design makes it super easy for him to put them on and tighten them up by himself—great for building independence. The traction is impressive, making them ideal for hikes and outdoor play. They hold up well on different terrains, and my son says they’re really comfortable. Best of all, he absolutely loves wearing them. Highly recommend for any active kid who loves to explore!

Bought these for my daughter who has wide feet and these are great. She’s too young to tie her own shoes, but the BOA lace system works perfectly for her (and is guaranteed for life through BOA if it ever breaks). They’re well made with great traction. She’s tough on shoes and these have held up well plus they give her independence with her shoes.

These are perfect for younger kids who havent mastered lace tying, so easy to use and great when you have multiple kids you dont want to redo the laces on the trails all the time. My daughter loves them, theyre comfortable and fit well and are very light weight. If i let her, she would wear them every day.

My grandson loves these shoes. They have held up to his 13 year old wear and tear. They are great shoes, very durable!!! And extremely easy to use and best comfort ever! Would definitely buy this product again.

We love these shoes! They’re breathable, stylish, comfortable, well made, and no laces to tie. The fit is good for my child’s wide foot. On Amazon the pricing is all over the place, so the value for money comes and goes.
My son loved these shoes and wore them for a year. I wish they made them in men’s sizing so I could get him the next size up.

My son is on his sixth pair of these shoes over the course of three years. He wears them into the ground through sports, hiking, and everyday reckless play. I never write reviews but I do believe that these shoes, while much pricier than other brands, are so good for heavily active kids.  We did a trekking trip through Patagonia and he wore these for fifty miles in a few days (versus the Salomon boots that we had brought him).  His feet never hurt. He then continued to wear them for a few more months to school, basketball games, and yard time. So while I begrudgingly paid the $70 this week for a new paid, I reminded myself of all of the excessive use that these shoes endured. Definitely worth it.

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam 510 V6 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their good arch support and nice colors. The fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some say they run true to size, others find them very narrow. Customers disagree on the feel, with some describing them as soft and squishy while others find them hard. Durability is also mixed, with some saying they hold up well while others report them falling apart.

Review.review: I recently bought the Women's 510 Running Shoe from New Balance, and I couldn't be more pleased with my choice. During my runs, these shoes have provided me with more support and comfort than I had anticipated.The midsole's cushioning is excellent, delivering a responsive feel that deflects impact without being overly soft. My knees have occasionally been sore, but ever since I started wearing these shoes, I've noticed a noticeable change in how they feel after my runs.Even on slippery or uneven conditions, the outsole maintains outstanding traction. With every step, I feel secure and solid, which frees me from anxiety about slipping or sliding and lets me concentrate on my run.These sneakers' breathability is just another fantastic quality. Even during extended runs or in warm weather, the upper mesh material keeps my feet cool and dry. No more uncomfortable and hot feet!In terms of sizing, I discovered that these shoes fit true to size and offer a secure and supportive fit without being oppressive. The design is fashionable and I value the range of color choices that let me select a pair that goes with my running gear.
New Balance is my favorite sneaker.  This is well made but a little wide.  I bought my usual size but they seem a little wider than usual.

The New Balance Women's Fresh Foam 510 V6 Trail Running Shoe are very nice and very comfortable.  I prefer a wide toe box.  I bought these in a wide size and they are wide enough for me to spread my toes.  If you like a really soft squishy shoe with a lot of arch support, these are great.  For me they were too squishy and archy and it made my feet work harder to walk in, which was bothersome.  The good part is the insoles can be removed.  Once I removed the insoles they were much more comfortable for me.
Great price. Very comfortable.

I have been buying New Balance Shoes for the better part of two decades.  They were my go to shoe because they fit my feet and were economical.  This is the second time I have had the exact same problem with these shoes.1.5 months ago, I ordered a similar style shoe only to find that they squeaked.  I did not end up returning them because I felt it would be a hassle.  So I ordered a second pair, this pair.Within a week, they are squeaking as well.  I understand the need to keep costs down, but they are compromising in the wrong areas.  New Balance has now lost a costumer.

I like these shoes very much, except for the insoles.  They fit me like I expected.  I need wide, and New Balance is one of the few brands with wide sizes that actually feel wide.  I have an average arch, and this shoe has the right amount of arch for me.  The shoes are well made and have a nice tread.  I have worn these hiking and camping several times and wear them often for just normal wear.  The shoes are not advertised as waterproof but do seem to be water repellent.  I have not submerged them in water but have worn them in damp conditions, and my feet remained dry.Now for the negative, the insoles.  The insoles are textured. The original packaging indicated the insoles were massaging.  I found the texture mildly annoying from the beginning but livable.  After only 4 months, the insoles became very annoying.  I could feel the texture a lot.  The insoles seemed to become hard.  My feet began to hurt quite a lot.  I was disappointed that I might have to discontinue using the shoes.  I took the simple, flat, thin foam insoles out of another pair of shoes to try in them, and the pain and discomfort immediately stopped.  I'm going to buy a cheap pair of thin foam cushion insoles for this pair of shoes, so I can continue to use them.  The shoes look almost new and show very little wear on the tread. Another problem with the insoles was that they squeaked with every step.  That is no longer a problem with the original insoles removed.

These sneakers are great!! They not only give great support but are very comfortable. They have just enough grip to make you feel secure but not stuck to the road. I love the way they look with multiple outfits, because the accent colors are subtle but bold enough to be beautiful! Definitely a great selection for a running shoe.

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam Garoe Mid V1 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these trail running shoes comfortable, durable, and well-made, with good ankle support and a stylish design. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some customers reporting a perfect fit while others find them tight across the toes. The waterproof feature also gets mixed reviews, with some customers saying they are waterproof while others disagree.

Review.review: Looooove these!!!! Not only are they cute, but they are super comfortable, kept my feet safe (bumped into multiple rocks while running a 8.5 trail race) and the ankle support… chef kiss!

Just got these midcut trail runners and been walking around the house for awhile.Initially I hesitated to buy because I sometimes have issues with the mid-ankle height. They tend to bother my ankle bone... but not these New Balance. They are comfortable and do not rub or chafe the bone.My other issue was the chunky squared heel/sole. I thought it was going to be obtrusive.  After putting them on and checking them out I think they are rather complimentary and do not stick out at all.The materials used in these hikers are very good.  I sprayed water on the toe area and it beaded and ran right off, so they are waterproof as listed. Gore-tex rocks!! No one likes wet soggy feet while running and hiking around the country!!Arguably the best feature on this shoe is the locking lace hooks. The final top two lace hooks lock the lace in when you snap it in... great feature because you don't have to hold tension when tying the laces!!! My Merrell hiking boots do not have this feature and I am forever trying to hold them tension at the correct point while tying them. It's rather frustrating because it's hard to get them right... they either get tied too loose or too tight. Not so with these. Once you set the correct tension you simply lock the lace it and it gets held right there so you can tie the shoe with ease.I wear an 8.5 M... in every shoe I have ever bought,  so I bought an 8.5 M and in length they fit perfect. My foot is by no means wide but wearing mid-weight socks these kinda hug my foot and the toe box feels a bit restrictive. I much prefer a wider toe box to prevent toe issues and foot fatigue. So my only real complaint is that this may be an issue on long walks, runs or hikes. Also due to the materials used making these, I rather doubt they will stretch any.Overall, I am glad I decided to give these NB a try... they are more comfortable than my Salomon Speedcross 4s which for me are far too stiff in the soles and tire my feet out.I will keep this pair...

These are my favorite sneakers. I get compliments on them all the time but I also like them bc they are super supportive especially if you have weak ankles. New balance has always been a quality shoe and these are no different. They fit like a cross between a trail sneaker and boot so just sturdy enough but not too sturdy that you feel like you’re wearing a hiking boot.
Very comfortable looking very nice and good engagement on trails

My daughter always wears New Balance shoes because they're durable and usually very comfortable.  She loved the look of these.  Unfortunately, the shoe is too shallow, creating pressure on top of the foot.  This hasn't been the case for other New Balance sneakers.  We were sad to have to return them, as they look very nice.
Excelent

I had been looking for a sneaker boot that would be appropriate for walking my large dog through off the beaten path parts of our local parks. I'm prone to stumbling and foot pain so the shoe needed to offer comfort and stability. I say this shoe does exactly as I need it to. It's comfortable and my footing is secure. The padding around the ankle helps stabilize my ankles while not being so thick and stiff as to be uncomfortable. I will say that some comments made mention of the shoe running slightly small. I think it's the width. I purchased my normal size 8 but got the wide version and it's perfect. I can wear thick socks if needed but don't feel like it's squeezing my toes. For me these are working out great and I would recommend them.

title: New Balance Men's 574 Core Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their style, with one noting they look newer for longer. Review.review: I purchased these for my son. He really likes them and wears them on most days above his other shoes. Comfortable and look great. Shoe quality is great.
New balances are the best shoes for walking and running even boxing i bought alot of different colors comfy and classics.

Recently just became a father of two and bought as an outfit but Oml these have changed my life. They are so comfy and hug feet for great support. They fit true to size and are great for the price. I’ll probably buy some in black next!

I’ve been using my New Balance Men's 574 Core for over a year now, and I couldn’t be happier with my choice. These shoes have exceeded my expectations in both comfort and style. The classic design pairs perfectly with almost any outfit, making them versatile enough for both casual outings and daily errands.One of the standout features has been their incredible comfort. I can wear them all day without feeling any foot fatigue, thanks to the excellent cushioning and support. The quality of materials used is also impressive – they have held up beautifully, showing minimal signs of wear even after extensive use.I’ve walked countless miles, and whether it’s on the pavement or trails, these sneakers provide great traction and stability. The breathability is another plus; my feet stay cool and dry, no matter the weather.Overall, if you're looking for a reliable, stylish, and comfortable sneaker, the New Balance 574 Core is the way to go. I highly recommend it to anyone considering a new pair – you won’t regret it!
Comfortable.Fit me well.Nice cushioning.

Great pair of shoes for everyday walking. New balance knows how to make a decent pair of shoes that feel great and look clean. While other brands focus on looks but feel stiff and hurt your feet after few hours lol. I highly recommend this brand for anyone that wants comfort and support.
Perfect & comfy!
I love this exact model of New Balance.  I have been wearing this model for .. I am not sure, 20-years?  I hope it never goes away.

title: New Balance Unisex-Child Fresh Foam Arishi V4 Bungee Lace with Top Strap Running Shoe

Review.review: I bought these New Balance sneakers for my daughter, and they’ve been perfect for her active days. They fit well, are easy for her to put on by herself, and give great support for  playing outside. The cushioning keeps her comfortable all day, and the shoes have held up nicely with no signs of wear after weeks of use. She loves the fun colors, and I love the quality—definitely a great buy!

These are the prettiest shoes! My daughter loves to wear these so much, every...single...day! The size shoe that she usually wears is 12.5 in big kids(she is 4 yrs old)&has very wide, chunky feet like me. I wanted a pair that she could wear comfortably and have room to grow into, as well. These were perfect fit! The foot entrance of the shoe was very stretchy, wide, and easy for her to insert her foot into. I got her a size 13.5 Ex-wife, since she usually wears size 12 wide in New Balance perfectly. And this style, this size, and this width was an absolutely amazing fit for my daughter! The value for the money was a great deal, the shoes came in it's original box(which was a big plus, since we store her shoes back into their box between seasons)&the shoe is lightweight&not heavy or bulky for her to wear! Perfect spring/summer time tennis shoe!
We bought these thinking they are lace up, but they are not. Our kid really liked the color and fit so we kept them. They have held up really well and don’t give her blisters.

Perfect shoe for my 6yo. I buy these in various colors as they go up in side.  Great fit with extra wide options for optimal comfort. The color and style makes my kid very happy and kids are able to put them on with ease.
Muy lindos, pero creo q las tallas son grandes, mi hijo usa #1,5 y pedí #2 y le quedan  muy grandes. Lo volveré a pedir pero 1 talla menos.

This is the fourth pair of this shoe style I have bought for my little girl. She says they're very comfy, but if I get other shoes she almost always says something hurts her feet. My only issue is that they don't offer a wide variety of colors for girls that aren't super light. They know these are kids shoes, any color close to white is going to get dirty fast. They also don't have a long enough strap to cover the whole velcro thing and when she sits on the carpet at school (she's in kindergarten they play inside for recess sometimes) they stick to the carpet.Anyway, overall it's a good shoe and they're rather durable.
Great shoes, nice fit. Purchased these for a 6 year old, size 13. True to size, room to grow. Will update with durability!
Update. They are cute but 9 days of wear and the toes are peeling

title: New Balance Women's Dynasoft Tektrel V1 Suede Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes incredibly comfortable, cute, and lightweight, with one customer noting they're perfect for both running and long walks. Moreover, the shoes receive positive feedback for their quality, with one customer describing them as great hiking shoes. However, customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding them true to size while others say they run small. Additionally, the fit and foot support receive mixed reviews.

Review.review: I'm thrilled with these New Balance Dynasoft Tektrel V1. From the first wear, they feel super comfortable thanks to the Dynasoft technology, which offers a soft, cushioned ride, perfect for both running and long walks. The lilac and white design is beautiful and modern, and goes great with athletic or casual wear.The traction sole is ideal for uneven terrain, and the suede finish gives them a sophisticated touch that isn't found in all athletic shoes. Plus, they feel lightweight, breathable, and very well made.I would definitely buy them again! If you're looking for comfort without sacrificing style, these shoes are an excellent choice.
Love it! They are so comfy and I can wear it all day daily or go hiking. They are slightly bigger and heavier than my other snacker but super cute and nice quality.
Comfortable and cute! No break in period and great trail shoes for easy to moderate hikes. The purple is the perfect pop of color but also neutral enough to wear outside of hiking

I decided to wear my New Balance sneakers on a recent trip, and so far they've been incredibly comfortable! The fit is great for walking long distances, and I absolutely love the white and purple color combo — stylish and fresh. I’m not sure if they are waterproof but I’m very happy with this purchase!For reference, I am  8.5 shoes size.  These are 8.5 and fit perfectly.
I just wore these for the first time today on a 6 mile hike that included scrambling up some rocks. They were so comfortable! No break-in time. Zero complaints! Great quality.  True to size.

I purchased these shoes and really enjoyed the way they fit.I noticed right away that they seemed somewhat slippery.Decided to dismiss it and wore them to work.I had a terrible fall.They are worse than ice skates.I am not sure what material is used on the base.But by the grace of god, I didn't break my back.I have to return them.They should improve the good fit of that shoe with a vibrant sole

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Rcvry V1 Slide Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, stylish, and appreciate their cushioning that's neither too soft nor mushy. The shoes provide good support, with one customer noting they're great for those with back or hip pain, and customers report their feet don't slip while wearing them. While some customers say the shoes are great for wide feet, others find them too tight. The sizing receives mixed feedback, with some customers saying they fit well while others report sizing issues.

Review.review: I wear these slides for doing work around the house, and they're super supportive and comfortable. The cushioning keeps my legs from becoming fatigued, even after I've completed a morning run, but is not overly squishy. I tried Crocs for the same purpose, but Crocs really made my feet hurt.I normally wear women's size 10.5, medium width, in New Balance running shoes, and ordered these in size 9. The fit is just right. Happy I found them!

These are great recovery slides.  I love New Balance for the arch support and cushion.  Be ware, the cream colored seem to not be true to size vs the black. Seems to be a manufacturing issue, I called New Balance, rep could have cared less!  In the cream I had to order a full size down.  I usually wear a W 9.5 and order a M 8.  In the cream color I had to order a W 8.5, M 7 and they fit perfectly!  I wear them everyday, have a pair in black as well.  Had plantar fasciitis and wear these in the house to support my feet.  Good quality, feet don’t slip.  I highly recommend.

First thing I noticed when I put them on is that the hexagon shapes at the heel is very sharp, feels like stepping on needles.  I had to grind away the foam with a dremel. The fit was a little tight, but a few minutes with a hair dryer resulted in a perfect fit.  These do look fantastic and are very comfortable.

- Sandals are cushiony, sinking in just a little to a solid-ish bed but without feeling too pillow soft or mushy. Have Fresh Foam shoes and can confirm the feel is similar.- Textured footbed provides grip for soles of feet so the sandal doesn't slip around. Also provides a slight relaxing massage feel.- Look is slightly bulky but overall pretty stylish, making more of a fashion statement that an IDGAF flip flop or velcro sandal.- Fit is a hit or miss. Width wise, this sandal fits both narrow and wide (2E) feet. However, the height of the upper (clearance from the footbed to the strap) does not correctly fit the proper foot size. Feet two (2) sizes smaller than the stated size cannot fully slide into it because of how restrictively low the upper is. The strap stretches somewhat, but after a few weeks of use it has not "stretched out" and always gives a too-tight-on-top-of-foot feel as if you were wearing a shoe one size too small and pulled the laces unreasonably tight.If you can dig the look and have not-tall feet (sole to top of foot), this recovery slipper will serve you well. For those of us with normal height feet, look elsewhere unless you like an extra snug feel - three stars ***
Most comfortable slides all day wear. Great for those with back or hip pain. Walk 8000 steps in one day with no real discomfort and having hip arthritis. Could replace your shoes.

i purchased these for a week in disney world but i wear them all the time. they are great slippers for casual wearing but also comfortable on long walks. ive even been complimented on them by other slide connoisseurs. dont let the high price scare you off, they are durable and functional.
