title: New Balance Kids' Fresh Foam X 860 V13 Lace-up Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, with true-to-size fit and plenty of room for toes to move comfortably. They receive positive feedback for their quality, with one customer noting they're recommended by a podiatrist, and customers like their style and arch support, describing them as a great stability shoe. The durability and value for money receive mixed reviews - while some say they're durable and worth the price, others report them falling apart and being overpriced.

Review.review: I’ve been running in the New Balance 860 for a few months now — usually 3 miles per run, at least 3 times a week — and I couldn’t be happier. As someone with wide feet, I’ve struggled for years to find running shoes that truly fit. I normally wear a women’s size 6 in length, but even in size 7.5 wide versions of many brands (including the highly recommended ASICS GT-2000 and Mizuno Inspire), my toes still felt cramped.Then I discovered that I could try wide-width boys’ shoes instead — and I regret not trying this sooner! The toe box in the New Balance 860 boys’ size 6 wide version gives me plenty of room for my toes to move comfortably, while still offering secure support around the entire foot. Breathability is excellent — even when walking outdoors in 90°F heat, I can feel airflow inside the shoe, which helps keep my feet cool and comfortable.The cushioning and support are great both for running and for long walks — my feet feel well-supported without any pressure points or stiffness. I highly recommend this option for other wide-footed runners — don’t overlook the possibility of trying boys’ sizes. I will definitely be buying these again!Bonus: the boys’ version costs less than women’s!

My son loves these shoes. He loved them so much we bought another pair in a larger size.  I love that we can get a width in shoes that fit him. We bought the stretchy laces so that he can just slip them on and off easily.
bought for my daughter, it is durable, lightweight and definitely worth the price. It was recommended by a podiatrist for kids shoes. I wish I bought this sooner.
My son loves these shoes! He is prone to find pain and the first thing he noticed was how comfortable they are. He has had them for a few weeks now and has not experienced any foot pain.

This is our third pair. After breaking her toe, my daughter's doctor recommended getting these in wide, which my daughter says she prefers over the mediums. Excellent quality and great for flat feet. Will purchase in all colors. Hope they continue to make these. Wish there was an adult version.
Comfortable fit for my active son’s wide feet

My kids loves them , very comfortable

title: New Balance Kids' 1440 V1 Lace-up Running Shoe

Review.review: We love new balance in our household because of the durability quality and style. My son wears wide shoes so the fact that they offer these in a wide is a great thing. They are comfortable to wear and have some arch support this is one of the only brands of shoes that he can wear due to his large width of foot. They fit true to size and the sole is a nice grippy rubber for running around.

Very pleased with the quality of these. We had went through several other brands in the last few months and they were all tearing, fraying, or functionally breaking with normal outside play within weeks of buying them. These are comfortable and we love the look. So glad to buy a well priced shoe that lasts. True to size, spacious fit for our son who can’t wear narrow shoes.

Great shoe. High quality. The size is accurate. The sole is rubber and my son doesn't slide around on smooth surfaces. The laces stay put when tied. He can get them on and off easy. And they are comfortable. Good cushion. I've also had to scrub them clean with a bristle brush and detergent and they held up great
True to size, held up well, good quality and price.
Lightweight, comfortable and a good looking shoe. The laces kinda thin and weird but we ordered some blue ones. Now he is really styling
These are great shoes! My daughter has a wide foot and New Balance is one of the only brands that offers wide in kid shoes. The quality is amazing and they are very durable. Color is true to picture.

My son is so picky with shoes.  We got these for school and wore them to Disney before school started.  After the 1st day at Disney walking 20,000 steps he said they were so comfortable.  He usually wears Nike so this was a win!

Update- after 2 months these have a hole in the side. For the money I expected them to last much longer! My son alternates between these and another pair so it’s not even daily use.Great for running and for every day shoes. They seem very well made and fit my wide-footed son perfectly!

title: New Balance Men's CT300 V3 Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable and well-fitting. Review.review: These are my son‘s favorite shoes. We were unable to get them at the shoe store however Amazon to the rescue. They’re exactly what he likes same brand quality, and size as he is used to.

These shoes are great stylish and casual shoes. I wear these to work and going out on the town. I have wide feet and comfortable stylish wide fit shoes are hard to find. The tongue is weird and foam like but it doesn't bother me. These are comfortable and look great. Would recommend for men with wide feet!
Love these sneakers. Very versatile. Can wear with almost anything.  Jeans, shorts, dress pants.
Shoes are really cool but, i asked for 9us men wide and they are too big! I have another pair of new balance skate style 9 size too and they are smaller. So im dissapointed because i cant wear it.

The New Balance CT300s are a great pair of sneakers overall. They’re comfortable right out of the box, with good build quality and a classic design that works well for everyday wear.However, one thing to note is the color. The blue tone shown in the product images appears darker and more saturated online, but in person, it’s noticeably lighter—more of a pastel blue. It's not a dealbreaker, but definitely something to keep in mind if you're aiming for a deeper navy look.Sizing is also solid. I ordered a size 8, and while they run just slightly on the bigger side, they still fit well and don’t cause any issues. No need to size up or down.All in all, a very good shoe that balances comfort and style—just be aware of the real-life color difference.

Love these.  Unlike other NB, namely the 515s & 574s, which run a size small, these 300s run true to size.  In the 515/574 models, I get a size 13 X-Wide, but I'm normally a size 12 Wide/X-Wide in any other shoe.  With these 300s, it's back to sanity:  12 Wide.  They fit perfectly.  My normal size, and the regular wide is wide enough.Plus, they have a versatile & flattering silhouette that goes with any pants, from sweats to jeans, and a colorway selection to fit all tastes.  Only thing to beware of:  They can scuff easily, so keep a magic eraser on hand and spray them with a guard to protect the suede and from staining.
Seems low quality but pretty and comfortable

Comfortable and the wide toe box, unlike other shoes, is virtually unnoticeable on the outside. Looks just like any other shoe. Comfortable and good looking shoe— A lil pricey for the materials involved and im not a fan of the random hole on the bottom exposing what I think is, midsole/inner sole.

Review.review: Amazing pair of tennis shoes, my child loves it. Very comfortable and super easy to put on. No laces so ideal for you D kids too.

Bought these for my toddler to wear to k4. They fit great and have held up well so far. Supper easy to put on and tighten/loosen. Just washed them for the first time this weekend and they look great. Love the color

These are great shoes for kids who have narrow feet and need a tight fit without fighting shoes laces. The velcro cross straps always wear out on the others and other no tie shoes are too loose for my kids. The 1 star deduct is because the tops of the toes do wear out quicker than other shoes, esp. for the high price tag. We wear them every day to school and they lasted 1 semester (3 months) because of the toes, not size. We're on our 2nd pair 2nd semester and just bought these the next size up for beginning of the school year. True to fit also.

We love the New Balance BOA shoes. My son struggles with tying shoe laces, but still wants to wear "cool" shoes.New Balance always creates great colorways for their shoes and the BOA is no different--the design of the shoe is neat the way it crosses over to where you turn the dial to adjust and secure the fit.We've bought several pairs of these shoes over the years and find the quality is great. They live up to the way kids can be rough on shoes playing on the playground and he said they were really comfortable when he wore them during a recent Disney trip. He's put some miles on his current shoes and they are still going strong, but I'm going to order a pair to replace them for when the time comes.

Love these shoes so much! I love that there are no shoes laces that need to be tied constantly and that they are such a great comfortable fit that my kids put on and adjust themselves. They are super durable and it’s a great price. Gives great support - I honestly keep buying more in new colors!

My son loves these sneakers. He is not the most independent child and it is so nice that he can do these by himself - and that they are "tied" tight enough for him to run around without his shoes being loose. I highly recommend. Also, they look cool. They also last pretty well - this is our second pair - he is pretty rough on his sneakers and they held up very well.
My daughter loves these shoes.  We keep buying them as her feet grow.  Surprisingly narrow - we buy wide width even though she does not typically run wide in shoes.  Great value for the money.

I wanted to write a review after my child comments. Here is her opinion.I got these few month ago for my girl.She prefers White color and  Comfy BOA-Type Sneakers. She said incredibly impressed with both the design and functionality. These sneakers are a great blend of comfort, style, and practicality perfect for active during Gym class.#Pros:1. BOA Closure System– The standout feature of these sneakers is the BOA system, which makes putting them on and taking them off super easy. No more struggling with laces or velcro—just a quick twist and the shoes are snug and secure. My child loves how fast they can get ready, and I appreciate how it makes it hassle-free to get the right fit every time.2. Comfortable and Supportive – The sneakers provide great cushioning and support, which is key for growing feet. The lightweight design doesn’t weigh down my child, and the padded collar and tongue add an extra layer of comfort. After wearing them all day, there are no complaints about sore feet.3. Durable and Well-Made – New Balance is known for making durable shoes, and these are no exception. The material feels sturdy, and the rubber sole offers excellent traction, so my child can run, jump, and play without slipping or causing wear and tear on the shoes.4. Stylish Design – The all-white color with subtle New Balance branding gives these sneakers a clean, modern look. They pair easily with any outfit—whether it’s for sports, school, or casual wear. My child loves how trendy they look, and I love how versatile they are.5. Breathability – The upper material is breathable, helping to keep feet cool and dry during active play. I’ve noticed that these sneakers don’t trap moisture or cause any discomfort, which is a huge plus for all-day wear at school.#Cons:1. White Can Get Dirty Quickly – While the all-white design looks sleek, it does tend to get dirty quickly, especially in active kids. Regular cleaning is a must to keep them looking fresh.2. Price– Like most New Balance shoes, these sneakers are on the pricier side, but I do think the quality, comfort, and convenience justify the cost.===The New Balance Kids White Comfy BOA-Type Sneakers have been a fantastic choice for my girl. With the easy-to-use BOA system, comfortable fit, and durable construction, they’ve become a go-to pair for everyday wear. If you’re looking for a high-quality, stylish, and functional sneaker that will keep up with active kids, I highly recommend these!

title: New Balance Women's 877 V1 Walking Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these walking shoes comfortable, with feet feeling snuggled inside and plenty of room for toes. They receive positive feedback for their quality, appearance, and suitability for both walking and daily wear, with one customer noting the grey with bluish green laces combination looks great. The arch support receives mixed reviews - while some find it excellent, others report very little support. Size opinions are mixed, with some appreciating the generous width while others find them running large.

Review.review: This was my 5th order of these shoes.  Each pair has fit consistently and held up well with regular use.  They are comfortable right out of the box and fit well even with my orthotics in them.  The wide toe bed has helped my toes “breath” and not get squished in regular styled shoes with pointy toe beds.  Functionally, they are just what I need to relieve foot pain and are easy to put on and take off.  Overall quality has been great on every pair purchased.
The shoes are very comfortable and take a lot of wear and tear.

I’m a 9.5 AA and these shoes look good and fit to size.  There better than average and good support, comfortable at the ankle not too high.  I’m keeping them.  I can still bend down and tie my shoes, so why not!

I love these shoes! But I believe they are being discontinued.  Very upset as these are the only shoes I can find that actually work for me. They come in wide, with a nice wide toe box. Which is very hard to find. I normally take a 7 wide, but since they are not in stock and I needed a pair. Had to order a 7 x- wide. Which still works for me.Great value for your money!!

I liked the comfort of the shoe.  Plenty of room in the toe box.  The colors are muted grey, blue, and white and go with most other colors.  However, the area of my big toe is wearing out after approximately 2 months.  I received 11/26/24 and it is now February 9, 2025.  I paid almost $80 for these shoes.  I do not wear them all of the time, mostly to work out in 3 times a week.  I expected them to last at least a year.  Also, they were supposed to be made in the USA, and it says on the shoe that they were made in Vietnam.

I had been looking at these New Balance walking shoes for quite a while. Amazon’s price was marked down 20% during Prime days and I jumped on it. I had a previous pair of New Balance walking shoes that I wore 10-12 years. They were still in good shape but I needed a half size larger. Great value and I know they will last a long time. So comfortable at very first wearing. Love them. Good looking too.

I am very happy with these shoes. They fit great and are very comfortable. I have been wearing this brand for years since they offer wide sizes. My feet also sweat a lot in some shoes. These allow them to breathe better than most shoes, keeping my feet from feeling wet when I take them off.

I ordered a pair of these shoes last year and loved them, so I ordered another pair recently.  Right away I could tell something was not right with the second pair.  After examining them closely and comparing them with the first pair, I believe that the new ones are a knock-off.  The new shoes appear to be about a half size smaller, although the labels say they are the same size.  The roomy toe box in the original shoes ( which is an important feature for me) is narrower  and the contours of the shoes are almost straight up and down instead of curved to properly fit.  There are several other details that are "off." I promptly arranged to return the shoes and described my concerns.  I would still like to have a second pair, but am hesitant to order them again.

title: New Balance Kids' 480 V1 Lace-up Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, with one noting the cushioned insole makes running softer on feet, and appreciate their true-to-size fit, particularly for wide feet. The shoes receive positive feedback for their style, with one customer highlighting their classic basketball-inspired design, while others praise their durability, with one mentioning they've lasted over a year of wear. Customers consider them great school shoes and good value for money.

Review.review: lance 480 V1 SneakersThe New Balance 480 V1 sneakers are a perfect blend of classic basketball-inspired design and everyday comfort. I picked them up recently and they’ve quickly become a staple in my wardrobe.Style:These have that vintage court shoe vibe with a clean, minimalist look that works well with a lot of outfits. Whether you’re into sporty streetwear or just want a low-key sneaker with subtle retro flair, the 480 V1 delivers. The “N” branding is bold without being flashy, and the overall silhouette is timeless.Comfort:For a sneaker based on a basketball silhouette, the comfort is impressive. The Ortholite insole gives you good support, and the padding around the ankle adds extra comfort. They’re great for all-day wear—walking around, running errands, or casual hangouts.Fit:They fit true to size for me. The toe box isn’t overly narrow, which is nice if you like a bit of room, and the laces allow for a secure fit. The leather upper is a bit stiff out of the box, but it softens up nicely with wear.Quality:The materials feel solid—especially for the price point. The leather upper feels durable, and the sole has good grip and traction. I’ve worn mine in a few different conditions, and they’ve held up really well.Final Verdict:If you’re looking for an everyday sneaker with heritage appeal, solid comfort, and clean styling, the New Balance 480 V1 is a great option. It’s easy to wear, well-made, and offers that classic New Balance feel without the bulk of some of their other models.⸻

I live New Balance sneakers for the high quality and support they give my preschoolers feet! These fit well, are easy to wipe clean and the price is great for the high quality. I love the white and blue colors for spring. My 3 year old can slip them on easily, they are lightweight and wide enough for his foot.

Took FOREVER to get to me, but they are still going strong! Good quality and true to size. My child never complained about them being uncomfortable, so I guess they are comfy. For them to last this long, I think they are worth the price. The color is perfect, super easy to style! They are easy to clean too! I take a baby wipe to them (don't judge me) and that does the trick!

I bought the New Balance Kid's 480 V1 Lace‑up Sneakers for my daughter, and they’ve been fantastic. They’re lightweight, comfy, and offer good support for all-day wear. The lace-up design keeps them snug, and the cushioned insole makes running and playing much softer on her feet. She loves the sporty look, and they’ve stayed clean and sturdy after daily use. The fit was true to size and they didn’t need breaking in. Overall, they feel well‑made and durable. We’re very happy with these shoes — they’re a great pick for active kids!

These are cool and I want a pair for myself actually. My daughter only used to like Nike AF 1's and I told her that NB are way more comfy. She has no Idea who Ozzy Osbourne was, it's not her generation, but I tried explaining to her that NB were his favorite because of their comfort. She loves them now and are her favorite pair of shoes now, not because of Ozzy, but because they're stylish and comfortable.

These are so cute! They definitely work for running around and playing as well as pairing with dressy casual. The wide toe box is important for my kids. My boys play hard and these have held up. Also easier to clean bc of the leather exterior. I have a lot of kids and I come back to these.
Nice shoe but it’s very heavy on my baby’s foot only put it on to go out and remove them after about an hour
These were the perfect size, they’re comfortable, and easy to put on, 🤣 according to my son.

title: New Balance Mens Minimus Tr V2
Customer_say: Customers find these cross training shoes to be of good quality, comfortable, and supportive, with one customer noting the wide grippy sole for stability. Review.review: This is the 2nd time I’ve purchased these shoes for my adult son. He absolutely loves them. Good quality and lightweight.

This is an excellent New Balance minimal cross training shoe. The shoe runs a half size small, so go up when you order, and I got the wide fit for additional room. Nice wide grippy sole for stability with Minimus zero drop profile. Although, I'll admit that adding a lightweight padded insole would make these supreme. I love NB Minimus shoes and was disappointed when NB got rid of their Minimus running line...My only complaints are the neoprene tongue because it slides a bit and the size issue which hints at lower production QA standards for New Balance. Regardless, it's a great lightweight zero drop shoe, especially if you can get them on sale. Easily 4 stars, 5 if my regular size fit out of the box.Pro-Tip: run the laces over themselves at the last loops for DIY lace lock. See pic.
Very well made.  These are a tad more narrow than past models.  But over all....love these shoes.
Took a chance with these being minimalist shoes. Excellent fit and support for lifting and body weight exercising. My feet no longer slide around inside my shoes. Definitely will buy again.
Lack of comfort. Very hard sole.
This is my 3rd pair of Minimus I have bought. All with great fit and quality. These ones fit and feel great.

I have been wearing a prior version of this Minimus Trainer for a while now, and love them, but I wanted a new pair.  So, I immediately purchased these, in the same size as my current pair (11 Wide).  However, I cannot wear these for more than a few minutes before my feet start to hurt, and I can't lace them loosely enough to prevent them from making my feet feel choked.  When I was running ultra marathons, the Minimus Road and Minimus Trail were my go to shoes.  Those were also size 11 Wide and the fit and comfort were also amazing.  In my opinion, the changes made in the Minimus Trainer v2 are a disaster for anyone with wide feet.  If you have wide feet, my suggestion is to look elsewhere for your training shoes.
Very comfy. Could use a little more arch support, but that is just preference.

The shoes feel durable and well-made, holding up through intense practices and games. Plus, the design looks sharp and sporty, which my kid loves. These trainers give confidence and performance combined with comfort—definitely a five-star pick for young athletes!

As a coach, i love the comfort of these shoes, nice and wide toe box. Enough traction for the infield so i dont slip when throwing bp. Only downside is it fits slightly big, these are half size bigger than nikes, but still amazing

I purchased these for my HS aged daughter. She said they are the most comfortable turf shoes / cleats she’s ever worn. Great quality and comfort for the price. She’s usually a 7 in women but can wear a 5.5 in kids so we drop down and save the extra $ why girls want white shoes on these red fields I’ll never know but she loves them. Style is nice, not to bulky but also not slim like Nike cleats. Decent grip for both turf fields and dirt fields.

My son absolutely loves these shoes! He has used these for baseball turf games and flag football as well. I would highly recommend these shoes to anyone in sports or just a good everyday shoe.https://amzn.to/3IKflE9
My son's favorite cleats. great for kids with a wide foot. very comfy

My son has feet conditions where he can’t wear spiked cleats but can wear turf cleats. These fit perfect and he has no complaints. Comfortable. Fits true to size. They did last one full season (March-June) before the toe part started to come off.

Ordered this item 3 weeks ago and it got lost. I don’t know who was responsible for it being lost but after it didn’t show up for 3 days after it was supposed to I took the refund option which I received in my account 3 days after choosing the refund. True to size,

title: New Balance Men's 806 V1 Tennis Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these tennis shoes excellent for actual play, comfortable, and lightweight, with good arch support and stability during quick lateral movements. The fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some find them a good fit, others report they're too tight in the toe box and one size too small. The slip resistance and durability also get mixed reviews, with some praising the traction on tile while others note the soles wear out quickly.

Review.review: Comfortable, like walking on clouds. Fit perfectly.  Always buy NB. For tennis too.
Great support and padding.  Exactly what I need for pickelball.  Super value.

I'd have to say this shoe is by far the most comfortable slip resistant shoe that I have purchased so far. I've bought Shoes For Crews and they suck, and were very expensive as well. Then I bought more expensive shoes by "Florsheim" but the slip resistant aspect of the shoe was poor and not comfortable after a long days work. However, these New Balance are exactly what I was searching for!!! They're really comfortable, as well as slip resistant. Inky thing is the size issue. I ordered my normal size, a size 10 W,  and the fit was a little bit too snug. I wore them for the day, and they eventually loosened up a bit. Overall, if I had to buy this shoe again, I would!!!

In my opinion this is a very good, supportive tennis shoe.  Many others shared that they felt this shoe was running small so I ordered it a half-size larger than normal.  They were too big; I returned them and ordered my usual size, and they fit perfectly.

The most recent pair of Newbalance  shoes I ordered (NB 806) did not live up to my expectations. I have bought several pairs of NB1006 (have been unable to find lately) in the past several years and have always been very pleased with the way they fit, their comfort and their durability. The pair of NB806 I most recently purchased that was specified to be the same size as all the pairs previous ordered was not wide enough nor long enough. I returned the first pair and ordered a wider (4E) pair as a replacement.  These were also very tight across the width of the shoe and very uncomfortable. Although I continued to try to wear them past the return deadline thinking they would loosen up, they have been very uncomfortable and I will not purchase Newbalance shoes like this in the future.  Some of my friends that I play pickleball and tennis with who have purchased the NB806 tell me they have also had the same experience as me.

I got a pair of these at Goodwill and they felt like the most comfortable shoes I'd ever worn, except they were too narrow. So I tracked down the official New Balance size charts and ended up here buying a men's size 9.5 Wide (hobbit feet, I guess). The metatarsal support really helps my feet feel better longer when I'm on them for hours at a time. Truly a revelation for me as I've never had arch problems, but that extra bit of support--the insole already has a good arch support--makes a big difference!

They look nice, people do seem to notice them. The shoe body does not hold up well. The rubber on the shoe sole wears and separates very quickly. The foam seems to break down quickly or not provide enough support leading to foot pain. The traction of the shoe on wet surfaces is great and these things are very water tight. These shoes do not breath very well. I walk alot for my job and for exercise, 1-3 miles per day, these are lasting about 3-4 months for each pair. For the price it’s not the best shoes I have owned. I did buy multiple pairs to start with due to a sale price and because I am rough on shoes. I won’t be reordering more.

Why did you pick this product vs others?:This was the only style that came in a 9 !/2 B.  I don't play tennis but this is definitely the best fitting and attractive sport shoe in my closet.Style:I lke the square toe, supportve fit, and textured medium gloss finish.

Review.review: Absolutely love!! So comfy, perfect fit, & don’t crease. These are mens shoes. I wear a women’s 9/9.5 & ordered a mens size 8. They fit perfectly with room at the end of the toe. I have middle to wide feet (definitely not narrow) & these shoes are so comfortable & great quality. I have ordered other colors in the NB 480’s.
Comfortable fit and fashionable and Cost friendly. Walked for a few hours- feet were supported quite well. Chocolate brown color is beautiful.
Super cute and comfortable. True to size

Very comfortable

title: New Balance Women's 577 V1 Hook and Loop Walking Shoe

Review.review: Perfect fit! Great price paid for New/yet Used.  Typically, I require a EEE width…the xwide width works perfectly!  Great quality and look that matches anything!  Super comfy.
Just got them and they fit perfect. If you have a lot of swelling in your feet as I do you will love the Velcro .

These shoes are easy to put on and you don't have to bother tying your shoes (mine like to come untied) and I can wear them to work as well as anywhere else. The only things to watch out for are that the tongue is a bit long and it pokes my shin, though the shoes feel like they are about 1/2 size larger than what I get with my Brooks shoes. I have room in both the front and back but they stay in place because of the straps.

So, the way I got turned on to these shoes was through a friend. She is an older working woman, (I am a young working woman), and she gave me a pair of these that she had worn through and let me tell you man, those were genuinely the most comfortable pair of shoes I’ve ever worn. My feet are wide and the shoes were not, so due to them being so comfortable, I was then forced to buy a new pair and they are just wonderful. I genuinely couldn’t recommend these enough. They offer great arch and ankle support, they’re ridiculously comfortable, and they’re really cute chunky white dad shoes. My one note is that they run a little narrow, so if you have a wider foot you may want to buy a wide pair in your size rather than just going up a size. Seriously tho,  I never write reviews, but these shoes are so good I had to. Highly recommend them especially for older people, (but I also love them as a 26 yr old). The shoe size I purchase was an 8 1/2 wide and they fit perfectly. These shoes are so good that when they eventually are ran through, I’m planning on just buying another identical pair. I’m almost certain these are the only pair of tennis shoes I’m going to wear for years to come.

I'm not sure if this is just better for people with specific types of feet, but it hurt mine and I couldn't keep it. The "tongue" of the shoe is a bit sturdy and hurts the upper area of my foot, and the support on the bottom feels a bit flat. Maybe I'm just too picky, idk. I bought this because a friend has it and it looks suuper cute. She's on her 2nd pair and absolutely loves it--says it fits her perfectly and that it is super comfortable!I guess it might just be my feet's format that's weird.In either case, it's a good quality shoe! The material is great, very sturdy and padded!

As a bartender I walk an average of 10,000 steps a day. Constantly running food, delivering drinks, and retrieving all the much needed stock. It keeps your feet dry and snug without being tight and easy to take on and off without having to readjust or tie shoelaces throughout the day. Not a pretty or ugly pair of shoes. Which is great. Super slip resistant and last me an average of 8 months. I have flat feet so I do add an insert, but these are still much more comfortable in comparison to alot of slip proof work shoes.

I wasn’t so sure when I first got these, they are heavier then what I usually wear but recommended by my orthopedic surgeon.  Well I bought wide width and wow they are great for walking.  I’m much steadier on my feet and they give me the support I need.  I did buy back of heel pads due to bone spurs so extra good.

title: New Balance Unisex-Adult FuelCell 4040 V7 Turf Trainer Baseball Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these turf shoes comfortable and well-fitting, with one noting the grip nubs are perfectly sized for everyday wear. They receive positive feedback for their performance, with one customer mentioning they work great for turf and clay surfaces, and another noting they're perfect for softball. Customers like the style, with one highlighting the subtle design in the side mesh area, and appreciate the good grip. While some customers consider them good value for money, others find the price point isn't great. The durability receives mixed reviews, with some finding them durable while others say they're not.

Review.review: Best pair of turf shoes I ever bought. Fit is perfect, love that New Balance offers wide and extra wide as an option. As described, the shoes are extremely light and makes movements feel effortless. Will definitely be purchasing again.

My softball player loves these! She said they fit well, are very comfortable and are very lightweight when worn. The turf bottoms get very good traction for her as a catcher. Overall great shoe quality and will definitely buy again when these need replacing. The white color is very unique, too, and even has a suttle design in the side mesh area.

The most comfortable trainers I have ever owned. Background: I was a semi-pro DH MTB rider for years, then Ironman Triathlete, and Marathoner (best time 2:56.25). I know what it takes to push the limits and now that I am playing in a very competitive adult baseball league, I know that: comfort, light weight and stability are valued benefits from a training shoe.I play Adult BB as a catcher and these trainers have added protection at the front of the toe without sacrificing mobility or comfort. The light weight foam allow me to wear these shoes just about everywhere, and the grip nubs are perfectly sized for everyday wear. The grip/traction is amazing on every surface, not just turf! Grass, dirt, concrete, slab cement, aluminum, etc… have all been tested and I have excellent traction.I removed the stock laces and replaced them with bungee laces (this allows more even top-foot pressure across the foot - something I learned from years as a marathoner and triathlete).Highly recommend these trainers for anyone serious about their training or that just appreciate a comfortable and capable athletic shoe.I usually purchase size 10 for all of my shoes, and these are no different. Just order your normal size and your will be good to go.I have normal width feet but I’m more flat footed than most people I know. The toe box fits comfortably secure and does not move around, while the heel are stays put like it should. What little “arch” I do have does feel supported, which contributes to the overall comfort.Highly recommend!

Great price at time of purchase ( < $70).  Extremely comfortable athletic-specific shoe.  Fits well around foot and ankle.  Quality components and may take a few accidental cleatings on field or in dugout.  Vibrant color as well.  Just a great product when acquired at right price.
I wear a size 12 medium width and these fit perfectly.  Like the style and the color was spot on. Great shoe for softball

I ordered a pair for my husband for Fathers day. He wears them to play softball on natural grass and he loves them! He says they are cool looking, sturdy and comfortable. He says they help him with his traction and help him move easily and smoothly on natural grass and dirt. He's not a big fan of traditional cleats. He wears these now to play in his men's slow pitch softball league.

I recently got the New Balance Unisex Adult FuelCell 4040 V7 Turf Shoes, and they have been amazing! They fit really well and provide great support, especially for running and quick movements on turf. The FuelCell technology really helps with cushioning, making it feel like I’m walking on clouds during intense play. The grip on these shoes is fantastic, offering great traction without feeling too bulky. I also love the design – they look sleek and stylish. Whether you're playing soccer, football, or just need a good pair of turf shoes, these are a solid choice!
Love these shoes

No good.  Uncomfortable the left shoe is smaller than the right shoe

I ordered these shoes in last week. I’ve worked three 12 hours days One14 hour day and One 10 hour day. All with these shoes on the whole time. I’m a truck driver so I do set and drive a lot, but I have to unload my 48 foot truck by myself and walk back and forth climbing, Twist pool squat. Over all there pretty darn Comfortable. But they are heavy. Close to the wight of boots. And they don’t breath very well I thing my feet sweat a lot I might wind up with Athletes foot. If I don’t take them off on the long drives. Only time will tell if they hold up I’m really hard on shoes. I will give an update at 6 months. And when I finally destroy the shoe.Iv been wearing the shoes 6 months now there holding up and especially cleaned. Because there waterproof they keep my feet dry from outside water and snow they work great for grip on snow ice water oil vinegar, milk, whatever spilled in the truck. They do make my feet sweet and there are starting to smell like a nasty gym locker room. I have to leave them in another room or in a bag. The backs by the Hill are starting to wear holes from slipping my foot in and out. And the material between the steel toe and my toes is wearing thin and feeling a bit uncomfortable. My toenails have scrapes in them aren’t the best shoes for Dolly Work. But over all I hate boots so I still like them. And would definitely buy again.
Great shoe
Strong

They seem to be holding up well. The safety toe cap seems to want to move or is easily flattened when I do a lot of kneeling. Also not as comfortable as new balance sneaker. I'll probably buy again but I feel my thorogood boots are more comfortable on long days.

As an automotive technician who is constantly on my feet and moving, I must say New Balance industrial work shoes haven’t let me down yet. These are just as comfortable and more stylish than my first pair of New Balance industrial shoes, 627v I believe they were(steel toes). My first pair lasted well over a year, I hope these are just as durable. They are also a decent price, so I bought 2 pairs lol

Quite comfortable and well made.

Very cool and comfy, casual sneakers. Not great for sports but stylish and comfy for walking around. They have a retro vibe which I really like. They are low-profile near the ankle, so fits well with pants or shorts. I’d say they run just a tad narrow, so maybe go up half a size. The New Balance Men's 237 V1 Sneaker seamlessly blends vintage aesthetics with contemporary comfort, making it a standout addition to any casual footwear collection.Design & Aesthetics:Drawing inspiration from 1970s running shoes, the 237 V1 features a sleek silhouette complemented by an oversized 'N' logo, exposed foam tongue, and a mix of suede and mesh materials. This combination offers a nostalgic yet fresh look that pairs well with various outfits.NEW BALANCE UNITED STATES OF AMERICAComfort & Fit:Users consistently praise the sneaker's comfort, noting its lightweight construction and cushioned midsole that provide support for all-day wear. The shoe fits true to size, accommodating both narrow and slightly wider feet. However, individuals with particularly wide feet might consider sizing up for optimal comfort.ZAPPOSDurability & Materials:Crafted with durable suede and mesh, the 237 V1 is designed to withstand regular use. The quality materials not only enhance longevity but also contribute to the shoe's breathable nature, making it suitable for warmer climates.SOLERACKSVersatility:The retro-inspired design, combined with a variety of colorways, allows the 237 V1 to complement a wide range of casual attire. Its versatile design and reliable construction make it a valuable addition to any casual wardrobe. For those seeking a fashionable yet comfortable sneaker, the 237 V1 is a commendable choice.

Beautifully styled shoes! If you lived in 1980-83 you had this style. Loved them! Breaths very well. The mesh material used in the construction will not allow the shoe to crease across the toe over time like leather shoes will!
These shoes are comfortable, deceptively black logo (or maybe dark blue, so flexible) and despite being bright white are surprisingly easy to keep clean
